ChrgBackDte.description: Last date on which your financial institution can recover 100% of a prepaid dealer reserve, as defined on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

PrpseCde.description:
Identifies the type of company with which the reserve is associated, as defined on the Company Basic Maintenance screen. (LNCBM).
 D Dealer
 I Insurance

NxtRebateAmt.description: Amount of reserve which would be rebated if the loan were paid off after the Current Reserve Rebate Good Through Date.

VolPndDte.description: Date when the pending voluntary insurance premium becomes effective.

AutoRteChgInd.description: For loans with accruing insurance, indicates whether a company subcategory rate change affects the reserve.

EarnRebateInd.description: Determines the method for earning and rebating of reserves.  Valid values:  1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, B, C, D, F, G, H, J, K, L, M, N, O, P, Q, S.  See Loans Reference Volume 2 for meanings of the values.

PrepaidInd.description: Indicates whether the reserve was prepaid.

HoldBackOpt.description:
The part of the prepaid dealer reserve that must remain on deposit at a financial institution.  Valid values are S, F, and P.
 S Set percentage of original reserve withheld by financial institution.  
 F Fixed amount withheld at statement generation.  
 P Percentage of dealer�s outstanding balance withheld at statement generation.

OrigAmt.description: For voluntary insurance, the monthly premium amount due. For financed insurance reserves, the premium for the term of the loan. For financed and prepaid dealer reserves, the amount of interest prepaid to the dealer.

DlrAmt.description: For holdback option S (split percentage), amount of prepaid reserve remitted to dealer, as defined on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

HoldbackAmt.description: For holdback option S (split percentage), amount of prepaid reserves retained by the financial institution, as defined on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

CatCde.description: Identifies the type of dealer or insurance reserve, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

SubCatRte.description: Reserve Accrual Rate. For insurance, the daily premium rate per $1,000 of the loan amount.

SubCatCde.description: Identifies the company subcategory with which the reserve is associated, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

VolCurDueAmt.description: Total of monthly premiums currently owed.

ChrgBckDays.description: The  number of days from the reserve effective date that the entire reserve can be charged back to the dealer.  Valid values are within 366 days from the reserve effective date.  Defined on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

DlrPln.description: Identifies the dealer plan number as defined on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

DlyAccrAmt.description: Amount accruing for the reserve each day.

VolPmtTyp.description:
Indicates how the insurance premium is calculated.
 0 Flat amount, premium is not recalculated.
 1 Calculated as a percentage of the principal and interest payment.
 2 Calculated as a percentage of the sum of the escrow and principal and interest payment. 
 3 Calculated as a percentage of the sum of the principal and interest payment, escrow payment, and other voluntary insurance payments.

YtdPdAmt.description: Amount of the reserve paid by the borrower in the current calendar year.

VolYtdPdAmt.description: Total monthly premiums paid by the borrower in the current calendar year.

BenAmt.description: For reserve earnings/rebate method S only, the payment amount on which the daily accrual calculation is based.  For all other reserve earnings/rebate methods, the field defaults to 0.00.

NbrRsrv.description: Number of reserves in the array.

LNBatchNbr.description: User-defined number used to group multiple account payments into one total.

LNPartSpreadInd.description: Indicates whether to override the automatic participation spread field on the loan when that field is Y, indicating the system automatically distributes principal and interest portions of a payment to any associated participations. A Y in this field prevents automatic distributions.

LNBillSeq.description: Number assigned to the account bill by the system if there are multiple account bills with the same bill due date.

LNWarnMsg.description: Gives additional information about error conditions.

LNTxnCde.description:
Identifies the type of transaction.  
 
 618  Account Bill Payment

LNEffDte.description: Transaction effective date.  Can be backdated.

LNReleaseDte.description: Date on which the transaction will be processed. System enters the current date.

Zip.description: The elementized ZIP Code of the collateral address.

CityLine.description: The collateral city, state, and ZIP code information.

Percentage.description: System-calculated percentage of the dollar amount in a collateral record to the total dollar amount of all multiple collateral.

ItmLstUpdtUsrId.description: ID of the last user who updated this collateral records Consists of the first character and last 3 characters of the user ID.

CollCat.description:
The collateral category value assigned to the Multiple Collateral record.  
 AG  Agriculture  
 AS  Assignment  
 CE  Commercial Real Estate  
 EQ  Equipment  
 FI  Financial Instruments  
 MS  Miscellaneous  
 RE  Residential Real Estate
 SE  Securities  
 TR  Transportation  
 UC  UCC

ItmLstUpdtDte.description: Date a user last updated this collateral record.

Amt.description: User-defined dollar amount of the collateral for this collateral record.

PrimaryInd.description: Indicates whether this collateral is the primary collateral associated with the note.  Y or N.

Fraction.description: The elementized house number fraction of the collateral address.

City.description: The elementized city of the collateral address.

HouseNbr.description: The elementized house number of the collateral address.

TypCde.description: User-defined value that identifies the type of collateral.

Direction.description: The elementized direction of the collateral address.

SpecialStr.description: The elementized additional street information of the collateral address.

MSANumber.description: The MSA number of the collateral.

Desc.description: User-defined description of the collateral information in the record.

Dte.description: User-defined date of the individual collateral record.

SupplmLine.description: The collateral supplemental street address information.

State.description: The elementized state of the collateral address.

StreetNme.description: The elementized street name of the collateral address.

BnkNbr.description: Identifies participant company record defined on the Company Basic Maintenance screen.

CmmtPrtInd.description: Sold indicator. If sold will have a value of 'S.'

Prty.description: If using an ascending or descending payment method and/or funding method, identifies the order in which draws and/or payments are applied.

CmmtPrtNbr.description: Identifies the portion of a lead commitment sold to a participant.

CmmtPrtUpdtInd.description:
Indicates update action to be taken on a specific commitment participation.                                                                                          
A = Add.</br>                                                                                 
C = Change.</br>                                                                    
D = Delete.</br>                                                                      
N = No change.</br>

UsedAmt.description: Internal processing field.  Before running this PUT method, the user must first run the GET method; then copy the data returned in the corresponding GET field into this PUT field.

PrcPln.description: Identifies the pricing plan associated with the account.

Typ.description: Identifies commitment participation�s commitment type as defined on Commitment Type Segment 425. Defaults to the commitment type of the lead commitment.

RCInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment participation balance is reduced by  participation payments.  Defaults to the revolving credit indicator of the  lead commitment.  Y or N.

DelInd.description: Internal processing field.  Before running this PUT method, the user must first run the GET method; then copy the data returned in the corresponding GET field into this PUT field.

LNPartHistIntTxn.description: Amount applied to interest for the participation payment.

LNPartHistPrinTxn.description: Amount applied to the principal balance for the participation payment.

LNParticipatingBnkNme.description: Name of the participating bank receiving a participation payment.

LNParticipationsCurPrinBal.description: Current principal balance of the participation.

LNEscrRte.description: Escrow interest rate.  Defaults to the rate on the Company Category Maintenance screen (LNCCM) if LN Escrow Type is I.

LNActvInactvInd.description: Any value other than zero indicates the escrow is inactive.  Code can be user-defined to indicate the reason for an inactive escrow.  0 = Active.

LNPndFhaAnvrsyMth.description: Month/year when the final (12th) portion of next year's premium will be remitted.  System-calculated in the 11th month for RBP escrows, and is 12 months later than the current anniversary date.  Represented as MMCCYY.  Default is zeroes.

LNNxtDisbDte.description: Required if the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 1 or 2.

LNUsrCde.description: User-defined code to further identify an escrow segment.

LNCustRcpntCde.description:
Indicates whether the borrower or the company payee receives escrow disbursements.  Default is 0 (zero) if the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 2 (noncollected).  
 C  Customer (borrower).  
 P  Payee (taxing authority or insurance company, for example).   
 0  Not applicable.

LNTrtsAddsTxnInd.description:
TRTS (TICOR) ADDS transaction indicator.  
 1  Delete.  
 2  Add.  
 3  Change.  
 Automatically set to 2 at new note time if the following applies:  The Automated Escrow Billing Indicator on page 2 of Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is Y; the  Customer Number on page 2 of Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is greater than zero; the Company Purpose Code is E (escrow); and the Tape Processing Agency Number is 17 (First American Real Estate Tax Service--FARETS).  Reset to spaces after ADDS tape for this period is produced.  Can be manually entered; must be manually entered for Values 1 and 3.

LNR7360Ind.description:
Indicates whether a request for a bill or a receipt is printed on the Tax Bill Request Notice (R-7360).  
 B  Bill.  
 R  Receipt.  
 N  Not applicable; no notice is produced.  
 When you set up a new note, the existing company field, R-7360 Default, provides  the following default functions:   If the R-7360 Default field is 0 (N/A) or P (Payee), the LN R-7360 Request Print Indicator note field defaults to N.  If the R-7360 Default field is C (Customer), the LN R-7360  Request Print Indicator note field defaults as follows:  For regular escrows (LN Escrow Collection Method 1), default is B.  For noncollected escrows (LN Escrow Collection Method 2), default is R.  For reserve escrows (LN Escrow Collection Method 3), default is N.

LNCkRcpnt.description:
For automatic disbursements.  Note:  If this field is not properly filled, escrow checks will not be produced.  
 C  Customer.  
 P  Payee (company).  
 B  Both customer and payee.  
 N  No check; paid list.  
 G  No check; paid list  is printed in group number order.  
 L  List disbursement; one check per company payee.  
 S  Set disbursement; one check per group per company payee.

LNDisbMeth.description:
Determines the disbursement amount for automatic and mass disbursements.  Can default from the payee's company record.  
 A  Current escrow balance.  
 B  Projected disbursement until end-of-year.  
 C  Amount to disbursement date (include delinquents).  
 D   Next expected disbursement amount.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNInsCoverAmt.description: Amount of coverage allowed by insurance policy.  For RBP escrows, is required and is equal to the original  mortgage amount less financed points and up-front premiums.  Can also apply to FHA or PMI insurance escrows.

LNNxtDisbAmt.description: Required if the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 1.

LNCurFhaAnvrsyMth.description: Current payment anniversary date.  Month/year when the final (12th) payment of the current year's FHA or RBP premium will be remitted.  This date is later than the issue date, but sooner than the maturity date.  Represented as MMCCYY.  Default is zeroes.

LNDisbExcpInd.description:
Indicates whether automatic disbursement is allowed.  
 Y  Yes.  
 N  No.  
 X  Do not allow any disbursements.

LNNbrOfInstallments.description: Number of installments, from one through four, to make per year for the escrow.  Applies only if the LN Disbursement Frequency is 9 and/or the LN Even Amount Escrow Disbursement Indicator is N.

LNTrtsHitCde.description: TRTS (TICOR) hit code.  Automatically updated with TRTS update tape.  Can be manually entered.

LNPyeNbr.description: Payee to whom the escrow will be disbursed as defined on the company database.

LNInsExpDte.description: For insurance escrows, the policy's expiration date.

LNLstDisbDte.description: Required if the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 1 or 2.

LNColMeth.description:
Escrow collection method.  
 1  Fixed dollar amount collected as part of the payment (regular escrows).  
 2  Noncollected (memo).  
 3  Held; collected up front; special assessment (used for reserve escrows).

LNCoSubcategory.description: Subcategory number defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

LNAutoDisbStat.description:
Indicates whether an escrow disbursement can be made; used with LN Automatic Disbursement Indicator of 3 or 9.  
 A  Not ready to disburse.  
 B  Ready to disburse.

LNDisbFreq.description:
Indicates how often the escrow is disbursed.  If the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 3, this field must be 9.  
 0  Unknown or not available.  
 1  Monthly.  
 2  Quarterly.  
 3  Semiannually.  
 4  Annually.  
 9  Other.

LNPremCalcMeth.description:
Premium calculation method used for RBP escrows.  
 SC  Straight calculation.  
 AS  Amortization schedule factor tables.  
 PF  Premium factor tables.

LNEscrIntInd.description: Indicates whether escrow interest is paid upon escrow disbursement.  Y or N.  Applicable only if the Interest Disbursement Frequency value on Escrow Interest Plan Segment 465 of Bank Control is 5 or 6.

LNEvenInstltInd.description: If there is more than one escrow disbursement per year, this field indicates whether all disbursements are the same or at least one is different.  Y or N.

LNEscrTyp.description:
Escrow type.  
 F  FHA.  
 I  Insurance.  
 O  Other.  
 P  PMI.  
 R  RBP (FHA risk-based premium).  
 T  Tax.

LNTrtsCntrtSfx.description: TRTS (TICOR) contract suffix.  Automatically updated with TRTS update tape.  Can be manually entered.

LNYTDDistAmt.description: For FHA escrows, this is the anniversary year-to-date amount.  For all other escrows, this is the calendar year-to-date amount.

LNTaxInsIdentificationMaintCde.description:
Escrow ID maintenance code.  
 Blank  Inquire.  
 A  Add.  
 C  Change.  
 D  Delete.

LNCkGrpNbr.description: User-defined number for automatic disbursements with a LN Escrow Check Recipient value of G (no check; paid list by group) or S (set check).

LNPndPrem.description: Annual premium amount for the next FHA anniversary year for FHA escrows.  System-calculated in the 11th month for RBP escrows.

LNAutoDisbInd.description:
Determines the disbursement method.  Can default from the payee's company record.  
 0  No automatic disbursements, but mass and individual disbursements are allowed.  
 1  Automatic, one-time disbursement on the specified next expected disbursement date.   
 2  Fully automatic disbursements occur according to the next expected disbursement date and the number of lead days.  
 3  Automatic disbursements like Option 2, but disbursements will only occur when you set the disbursement status to B (ready to disburse).  
 9  Mass disbursement allowed when the disbursement status is B (ready to disburse).

LNAutoDisbLeadDay.description: Number of days before the next disbursement date that an automatic disbursement is generated.

LNTaxInsIdentificationNbr.description: Line number for the tax ID or policy number.  Values are 01 through 99 or system-assigned beginning with 01.

PriorYTDDisb.description: Prior year-to-date disbursed amounts for all escrow types.

LNCoCat.description: Three-character user-defined category code defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control, such as TAX or INS.

LNLstDisbAmt.description: Required if the LN Escrow Collection Method field is 1.

VltryInsBilledNotPdAmt.description: Amount of voluntary insurance billed but not paid.

DayToStp.description: For category R loans, number of days loan is past due before insurance reserve stops accruing.

YTDAccr.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest accrued year to date.

RteChgInd.description:
For category R loans, indicates the effect of a rate change made at the subcategory level. May default from Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM).  Valid values are Y or N.  Default value is N.
 N Affects new reserve segments only.
 Y Affects new and existing reserve segments.

TrmntAge.description: For insurance reserves, age at which the customer�s coverage ceases and the reserve is automatically inactivated.  May default from the company record, as defined on Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM).  If entered, the Loan System will automatically calculate and fill LN Reserve Termination Date field accordingly.  Currently not available on inquiry.

ResrvRte.description: For reserves with an earnings/rebate method of 1, 3, or B, the rate at which the reserve accrues if different from the rate specified on Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM). For insurance reserves, rate is per $1000.00 of coverage per day.

ChrgbkDte.description: System-calculated date after which the bank can no longer recover the full amount of the dealer reserve, based on the value specified in the CHARGEBACK DAYS field on Dealer Plan Segment 480 of Bank Control.

MTDPdAmt.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest paid month to date.

InsCapAmt.description: For accruing insurance, the maximum loan amount the company will insure. May default from the company record, as defined on Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM).

TrmntResnCde.description:
Indicates reason for termination of the reserve.
 0 Age termination feature not used, or reserve not terminated.
 1 Terminated at customer�s request.
 2 Terminated at request of financial institution.
 3 Terminated at request of company.
 4 Terminated due to death of insured.
 5 System termination - insured reached maximum age for coverage.
 6 Manual termination - insured reached maximum age for coverage.
 7 Coverage extended due to extension of loan.
 8-20 User-defined.

YTDPdAmt.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest paid year to date.

MTDAccr.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest accrued month to date.

EarningRebateMeth.description: Indicates earnings/rebate calculation method for a reserve.  Valid values:  1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, B, C, D, F, G, H, J, K, L, M, N, O, P, Q, S.  See Loans Reference Volume 2 for meanings of the values.

EffDte.description: Date reserve begins earning or rebating.

LTDPdAmt.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest paid since the loan originated.

VltryInsPmtTyp.description:
For voluntary insurance, indicates how the premium is calculated if the customer�s loan payment changes. May default from Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM). 
 0 Not recalculated.
 1 Calculated as a percentage of principal and interest.
 2 Calculated as a percentage of principal and interest plus escrow.
 3 Calculated as a percentage of principal and interest plus escrow and other voluntary insurance.

CurAccr.description: The current amount of insurance or dealer interest accrued.

RsrvNbr.description: Identifies the insurance or dealer reserve.

LTDAccr.description: The amount of insurance or dealer interest accrued since the loan originated.

PrpseCde.description:
Identifies the type of company, as defined on Company Basic Maintenance (LNCBM).
 D Dealer.
 I Insurance.

ClaimFiledInd.description: Indicates whether a claim has been filed against the reserve.  Y or N.  Default value is N.

Amt.description: Total amount of the dealer or insurance reserve. For insurance with an earnings/rebate method of 6, the monthly or biweekly premium amount.

RecourseNbr.description: For dealer reserves, the percentage of the loan for which the bank is reimbursed if the customer defaults on the loan. Informational only.

PrepaidInd.description: Indicates whether the reserve is prepaid.  Y or N.  Default value is N.

VltryInsMaxPremAmt.description: For voluntary insurance, the maximum amount of the monthly premium. May default from the company record, as defined on Company Category Maintenance (LNCCM).

VltryInsPndAmt.description: Amount of the currently pending voluntary insurance premium. On the pending premium date, the pending premium overrides the current amount if the amounts are different.

TrmntDte.description: Date on which the reserve is terminated. Defaults to loan maturity date.   If LN Reserve Termination Age field is entered, Loan System will automatically calculate and fill this field accordingly.

CoNbr.description: Identifies a set of company options and defaults, as defined on Company Basic Maintenance (LNCBM).

Subcategory.description: Identifies a company subcategory, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

Cat.description: Identifies a company category, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

VltryInsPndDte.description: For voluntary insurance, the effective date of the pending premium.

BenAmt.description: For reserve earnings/rebate method S only, the payment amount on which the daily accrual calculation is based.  For all other reserve earnings/rebate methods, the field defaults to 0.00 and will not allow entry.

OldExcesYld.description: The excess yield, before this transaction.

LNCategory.description:
Identifies the loan category for account-level rate changes (Rate Indicator is A).  Rate change will be applied only to notes of this category.  
 C  Commercial.  
 F  Floor plan.  
 I  Installment.  
 M  Mortgage.  
 R  Revolving credit.  
 S  Specific accounts receivable.

RateCap.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Sets the amount the interest rate can move up or down per rate change.

OldRteUnder.description: The rate under, before this transaction.

NewRteOver.description: The rate over, after this transaction.

RateUnderMargin.description: For variable split-rate loans, the numeric relation to the index.  Expressed as points or a percentage.  If less than 1%, a zero must be entered to the left of the decimal point.

RateInd.description:
Identifies the level of records to which the rate change is being applied.  
 A  Account level (to the entire account).  
 K  Keyword level (to a group of Bill Type F floor plan loans).

Index.description: Identifies the index to which this loan is related, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

PricePlan.description: Identifies the pricing plan associated with the account.  May default from the pricing plan on the related commitment.

NxtRteChgDte.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Identifies the date when note is eligible for the next rate change.  For all other loan types, use the appropriate keyword to change this field.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

RateOverMargin.description: For floating-rate loans, the numeric relation to the index rate.  Expressed as points or a percentage.  If less than 1%, a zero must be entered to the left of the decimal point.  Also used for variable split-rate loans.

RtePln.description: Rate plan number.  Identifies a specific rate plan record to which the note is tied, as defined on Rate Plan Segment 455 of Bank Control.  To remove a rate plan from a note, a zero must be entered.

RateOverRelInd.description: Relationship of margin over to index rate.  For floating-rate loans, the relationship of the margin over to the index (+, - , or %).  Also used for variable split-rate loans.

NewRteUnder.description: The rate under, after this transaction.

Basis.description:
Identifies the accrual basis.  
 0  Actual-day month/360-day year.  
 3  30-day month/360-day year.  
 5  Actual-day month/365-day year.  
 7  Actual-day month/actual-day year.  
 9  30-day month/365-day year.

SplitLimitAmt.description: Split-rate limit.  For split-rate loans, this is the division point.  Any balance over this limit accrues at the rate over; any balance under and up to this limit accrues at the rate under.

RteChgFreq.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Determines when the note interest rate will change based on changes made to the related index.  For all other loan types, use the appropriate keyword to change this field.

RateUnder.description: For fixed split-rate loans, the rate to be charged on the portion of principal under and including the split-rate limit.

OldRteOver.description: The rate over, before this transaction.

RateUnderRelInd.description: Relationship of margin under to index rate.  For variable split-rate loans, the relationship of the margin under to the index (+, - or %).

NewExcessYld.description: The excess yield, after this transaction.

RateOver.description: For fixed-rate loans, the interest rate of the note.  For fixed split-rate loans, the rate for the balance over the split-rate limit.  For notes tied to a variable plan, the initial rate of the note represented as nnn.nnnnnn.  All nine digits need not be entered if a decimal is entered.

EffDte.description: Date the rate change is to be effective.  Defaults to today's date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

Category.description: Company category code as defined on the Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.  On Segment 445, this is a displayed as a 4-character code consisting of company purpose code (D for dealer, E for escrow, or I for insurance) followed by the 3-character user-defined category code.  Enter just the 3-character category code here.

TranCode.description:
Transaction code.  
 920  Reserve credit adjustment  
 940  Reserve debit adjustment  
 941  Reserve debit disbursement  
 943  Holdback debit adjustment  
 944  Holdback credit adjustment

EffDte.description: Transaction effective date.  Format: CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LstTransPstDte.description: Effective date of last posted monetary transaction.

LNIndx.description: For variable-rate loans, identifies the index number used to calculate the interest rate, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

NoteStrtIntDte.description: Date, if other than the loan issue date, when interest begins to accrue on simple interest loans.

LNCollCde.description: With the exception of the system-defined values of A or blank for the first digit, two-digit user-defined code identifying the loan collateral.  If the first digit is A or blank, the loan is reported to the credit bureau as unsecured; for all other values, the loan is reported as secured.

FrclsrInd.description:
Indicates whether the note is in the foreclosure process.  
 Blank  Note is not in foreclosure.  
 A-9  User-defined code to indicate the foreclosure status.

DlrResrvCoNbr.description: For loans with dealer reserves, identifies the dealer.

LNNoteLvlCalcBlendedRte.description: The blended rate for a tiered rate plan.

LNAutoPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether automatic payments are processed and whether overdrafts are allowed. 
 0  No automatic payments processed.  
 1  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts not allowed.  
2  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts allowed. 
3  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts allowed which will automatically process through Exceptions Desktop or On-Line Exceptions.

ComtUsedBal.description: Total outstanding draws made against the commitment.

FrclsrDte.description: Date the note was placed in foreclosure status.  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNLienFileDte.description: Identifies the date that the lien was filed and recorded with the state or county.

LNAccrRoundedTo7Dcml.description: Amount of interest accrued but not paid on the loan.

LNRecBook.description: Used to track the plat book in which the indirectly sold mortgage was recorded.

LNAchAcctTyp.description:
Identifies the type of account from which ACH payments are drawn.  
C  Checking.  
 S  Savings.

LNCurPrinDue.description: The principal portion of the current bill that has not been paid.

LN1098EIntYTD.description: Accumulated interest paid year-to-date on a certified educational loan during a covered period.

LNNColModel.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the model of the item held for collateral.

LNRepoEffDte.description: Will contain a value if there are more transactions to be returned.  To view the next set of transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here. Can also be used to limit the transactions returned to those with an effective date of this value or later.

LNNColUserScore2.description: Used to track additional credit score values.

LNNColUserScore1.description: Used to track additional credit score values.

LNDrawInd.description: Determines whether a draw can be made against a commitment.  For revolving credit notes with an automatic draw delinquency indicator of Y, may reset to N when a bill remains unpaid for the number of days specified in lLNAutoDrawDelinquencyDay.

LNRteTyp.description:
Indicates whether note has a blended or tiered rate plan.  
 B  Blended.  
 T  Tiered.  
 Blank  Neither.

TLCNoteInd.description: Indicates whether the note is part of a TLC (total line of credit) relationship.

LNNColYear.description: Identifies the year that the indirectly sold item was manufactured.

LNRepoSeqNbr.description: Will contain a value if there are more transactions to be returned.  To view the next set of transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

LNNColPropTaxID.description: Used to track the parcel ID, folio number, or legal description of indirectly sold property.

LNNmeAndAddrInd.description: Number from 1 through 9 identifying the name/address record.

IntPdEopy.description: Amount of interest paid in the previous calendar year.

ComtAvailBal.description: Amount of the commitment balance currently available to the borrower.

LNOrigBal.description: Original principal balance (amount financed) of the loan.

TypeDwnld.description:
The type of inquiry desired.  
 1  Summary information only.  
 2  Detail information only.  
 3  Both summary and detail information (default).  
 4  Detail and fee information.  
 5  Summary, detail, and fee information. 
 6  Fee information only.

NbrOfFeeTxn.description: The actual number of transactions returned, up to 50.  If output is zero, no transactions meet the criteria.

LNNoteTyp.description: Identifies a set of note options and defaults, as defined on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

LNChrgInd.description:
For automatic bill payments, indicates the type of account to which a bill is charged.  
 A  Automated Funds Transfer System.  
 D  DDA.  
 S  Savings.

LNRepoFeeTranSeqNbr.description: Will contain a value if there are more fee transactions to be returned. To view the next set of fee transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

LNRlt1Ovr.description:
For variable-rate or variable-plan loans.  Indicates if the loan's rate is floating above or below or as a percentage of the index.  
 +  Rate is floating above the index.  
 -  Rate is floating below the index.  
 %  Rate is floating as a percentage of the index.

LNDPAcctNbr.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, identifies the deposit account from which checks are drawn to access the loan.

LNNoteCmmtNbr.description: Identifies the first commitment related to the note being inquired on. If note is not related to any commitment, will return 0.

LstPmtPstAmt.description: Amount of the last posted monetary transaction.

LNAbaAcctNbr.description: Customer account number at the financial institution funding the ACH transactions for this loan.

LN232PayoffTotAmt.description: Amount due to pay off the loan.

LNCmmtNbr.description: Commitment number to inquire on.  If left blank, LN Note Commitment Number will return the first commitment related to the note being inquired on, and other commitment fields will return information about it.  If left blank and no commitment is related to note being inquired on, LN Note Commitment Number will return 0, and other commitment fields will be blank.

LNNColVinSerialNbr.description: Used to track the identification number of an indirectly sold item.

LNRepoFeeNbr.description: Will contain a value if there are more fee transactions to be returned. To view the next set of fee transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

LNBlockInq232.description:
Y  Do not allow 232 inquiry.  
 N  Allow 232 inquiry.

LNNmeAddrInd.description: Number from 1 through 9 identifying the name and address record.

LNTaxIdCde.description:
Identifies the type of taxpayer identification number.  
 N  No number.  
 F  Federal tax number.  
 S  Social security number.  
 T  Nonresident alien taxpayer identification number.

LNVendSweepTyp.description: Identifies a vendor's deposit sweep type. informational only.

TotYtdIntPaid.description: Interest paid since the beginning of the current calender year.

LNNxtRteChgDte.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, date when the rate is next eligible to change.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNRvlvgInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment is revolving.  Y or N.

MoreFeeTxnInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates there are more fee transactions to be returned.

TLCCmmtInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment is part of a TLC (total line of credit) relationship.

BkrptDte.description: Date the note was placed in bankruptcy status.

LNLienRelDte.description: Identifies the date that the lien was terminated with the state or county.

LNSbaInd.description:
Indicates whether the borrower is a small business or small farm, and if the loan is guaranteed by the Small Business Administration.  
 N  Neither.  
 R  Small farm, not guaranteed by the SBA.  
 S  Small business, not guaranteed by the SBA.  
 Y  Small business, guaranteed by the SBA.

MtdAvgBal.description: Average principal balance for the current calendar month.

LNFlrPlnInd.description: Indicates whether the account has associated Bill Type F floor plan loans.

YtdAvgBal.description: Average principal balance for the current calendar year.

LNBasis.description: Indicates the accrual basis of the note.  Only a basis code of 3 (30-day month, 360-day year) can be used as the basis for the amortization schedule.

LNPdStat.description: Indicates the paid status of the loan.

LN231NoteOffcrInitials.description: Initials of the primary officer responsible for the loan, as defined on Officer Segment 110 of Bank Control.

LNTotIntBilledNotPd.description: The total interest portion of all unpaid bills.

PMIInd.description: Indicates whether the PMI disbursed amount is allowed to be displayed on the 1098 or 6807/1098 combined form.  Y or N.

LNIntRte1Ovr.description: For loans with a fixed rate, the rate at which the loan accrues interest.  For split rate or rate plan loans, the accrual rate on any balance up to and including the split rate limit.  For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, the current rate at which the loan accrues interest.

LNIssDte.description: Effective date of the loan.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

TotLNFeesDue.description: Total late, extension, payoff, and miscellaneous fees due.

LNMrgn1Ovr.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans.  If LN Relationship 1 (Over) = + or -, the number of points above or below the index at which the rate is floating.  If LN Relationship 1 (Over) = %, the percentage of the index at which the rate is floating.

LNRepoFeePln.description: Will contain a value if there are more fee transactions to be returned. To view the next set of fee transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

LNBillTyp.description:
Controls the way bill segments are created and affects how payments are applied.  
 0  Bill-cycled (without bill segments); floor plan (floor plan indicator on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is 0).  
A  Due date-to-due date or amortizing.  
 B  Bill-cycled (with bill segments).  
 C  Payment date-to-payment date.  
 F  Bill-cycled (with bill segments); floor plan (floor plan indicator on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is 2).

LNRepoFeeEffDte.description: Will contain a value if there are more fee transactions to be returned. To view the next set of fee transactions, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

RCIntOnlyInd.description: Indicator on the loan system that allows banks to identify loans that need to have a special message printed on loan statements if a revolving credit loan is secured by real estate.

LN231NoteOffcrNbr.description: Identifies the primary officer responsible for the loan, as defined on Officer Segment 110 of Bank Control.

LNUsrFlg2.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNRecPage.description: Used to track the page number of the plat book in which the indirectly sold mortgage was recorded.

LNUsrFlg1.description: User-defined code used to group accounts for reporting purposes.

LNAbaRoutNbr.description: Routing number for the institution funding ACH transactions for this loan.

ComtUnusedBal.description: Difference between the current commitment amount and commitment used amount.

LNFedCallRptCde.description: Code identifying the loan classification for federal call reporting purposes, as defined on Classification Segment 415 of Bank Control.

LNUsrFlg5.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNUsrFlg4.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNUsrFlg3.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNCurrBal.description: Loan�s unpaid principal balance on processing date.

LNInstrNbr.description: Large states such as California have replaced the Record Book and Page concept with the Instrument Number.  The Instrument Number represents the mortgage document�s recorded number assigned by the county official.

LNAutoPartDistInd.description: Indicates whether payments applied to the note are automatically distributed to any participations sold.  Y or N.

ComtCurBal.description: Current approved amount of the commitment.

LNStat.description: Status.  Indicates whether the loan is partially or completely charged off, and whether the loan is earning interest.  May also identify the reason for nonaccrual or charge-off status.  See Loans Reference Manual for a complete list of status codes.

LNOrigIntRte.description: Original interest rate of the loan.

NbrRows.description: The actual number of transactions returned. If output is zero, no transactions meet the criteria.

LN231NoteNextDueDte.description: For Bill Type 0 loans, the date of the next bill to be generated. For all other loans, the date of next scheduled payment due on the note.

PendLNTyp.description: The note type that will be effective with the next pending run.

ComtTypPnd.description: The commitment type that will be effective with the next pending run.

LNNColVinSerialCode.description:
Code to identify which type of identification number was entered in the VIN/Serial Number field.  
 V  Vehicle identification number.  
 S  Serial number.  
 Blank  No identification number entered.

LNNColMake.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the make of the item held for collateral.

MoreTxnInd.description: A'Y' in this field indicates there are more transactions to be returned.

LNSndNoBillInd.description:
Determines method of billing used for the loan.  
 A  Bill is addressed to customer address listed on the note.  
B  Bill is addressed in care of the financial institution.  
C  Coupons; no bills sent.  
 D  Automated charge through ACH.  
 E  Automated charge through ACH and bill addressed to customer address listed on the note.  
 L  Coupons for regular payments and bills for late charge fees.  
 N  None; bills or coupons not produced.

LNBkrptInd.description:
With the exeption of the following system-defined values, a user-defined code intended to indicate the form of bankruptcy the customer has filed.  
 0  No bankruptcy.  
 1  Chapter 7.  
 2  Chapter 11.  
 3  Chapter 12.  
 4  Chapter 13.

LNCurIntDue.description: The interest portion of the current bill that has not been paid.

LNCollDesc.description: User-defined description of collateral supporting the loan.

LNTotPrinDue.description: The total principal portion of all unpaid bills.

LNFhaInd.description:
Used to identify an FHA loan.  
 0  Not an FHA loan.  
 F  FHA.  
 N  FHA and not escrowed.

MLoanIntPaidYTD.description: Amount of interest paid this year.

DPFlt10BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Ten business day available float amount as of start of day.

DPLstStmtDte.description: The date a statement was last produced for account. If the account is new, the last statement date will be zeros until a statement is produced.

DPStmtMrktNme.description: Bank-defined market name for this type of account.

DPFlt9BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Nine business day available float amount as of start of day.

FrclsrInd.description:
Indicates whether the note is in the foreclosure process.  
 Blank  Note is not in foreclosure.  
 A-9  User-defined code to indicate the foreclosure status.

SrcID.description: Identifies the medium through which the customer requested the new account.

CIEnt2ToEnt1RltCde.description: Code indicating relationship of this account to account being inquired upon, as defined on Relationship Codes Segment 605 of Bank Control.

CBCrdResnCde.description:
Cardbase reason code.  
 B  Bank closed.  
 C  Customer closed.  
 F  Fraud.  
 K  Kiting.  
 L  Lost.  
 N  Inactive.  
 O  Other.  
 P Closed by collections.  
 S  Stolen.

LNLienFileDte.description: Identifies the date that the lien was filed and recorded with the state or county.

DPTDIntPdLstYr.description: Interest paid last year on time deposit.

DPFlt2BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Two business days available float amount as of start of day.

DPTDCurBal.description: Current balance of the time deposit.  Includes available interest if interest payment method is add-on.

LNRecBook.description: Used to track the plat book in which the indirectly sold mortgage was recorded.

AcctAvailBalLabel.description: Label for Deposit Account Available Balance field.

TotalAccessBalLabel.description: Label for Deposit Total Accessible Balance field.

CIRltBnkNbr1.description: FIS host system bank number on which account resides.

MLoanIntPaidPrYR.description: Amount of interest paid last year.

LNNColModel.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the model of the item held for collateral.

IntPdYTD.description: Total of all interest paid on the note as of today for the current year.

LNTerm.description: Number of months between loan issue date and maturity date.

LNNColUserScore2.description: Used to track additional credit score values.

LNNColUserScore1.description: Used to track additional credit score values.

MLoanIssueDte.description: Mloan effective date of the loan.

DPClosDte.description: Date the deposit account was closed.

LNNColYear.description: Identifies the year that the indirectly sold item was manufactured.

DPPRAAvailLne.description: The amount of available PRA line expressed in whole dollars.

DPFltOneDayCollectableAmt.description: One business day collectable float amount as of start of day.

LNNColPropTaxID.description: Used to track the parcel ID, folio number, or legal description of indirectly sold property.

ExtCustID.description: The customer ID used by a third party and FIS to manage account transfers from an external account to a FIS account.

DPFltTwoDayCollectableAmt.description: Two business day collectable float amount as of start of day.

IntPdEopy.description: Amount of interest paid in the previous calendar year.

DPLstStmtBal.description: Account balance as of the last statement date.

DPFlt5BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Five business days available float amount as of start of day.

RemngPmt.description: Number of payments remaining before maturity.

DPFlt6BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Six business day available float amount as of start of day.

LNOrigBal.description: Original principal balance (amount financed) of the loan.

DPDormInactvInd.description:
Indicates whether account is dormant or inactive.  
 Blank  Active.  
 D  Dormant.  
 N  Inactive.

LNNoteTyp.description: Identifies a set of note options and defaults, as defined on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

CIAcctStatCde.description:
Indicates whether the account is open or closed.  
 C  Closed.  
 O  Open.  
 V  Virtual Bank Manager (Internet accounts only).

CIRltExpDte.description: Expiration date of relationship.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

MLoanPrinIntAmt.description: Mloan first loan principal and interest amount.

DPFltThreeDayCollectableAmt.description: Three business day collectable float amount as of start of day.

LNAcctOpenDte.description: Date the loan account was opened.

MLoan2ndPrinIntAmt.description: Mloan second loan principal and interest amount.

DPTDTermInd.description: Indicates whether value in DP Time Deposit Term refers to days (D) or months (M).

DPAcctNbr.description: Deposit System account number.  For retirement accounts, enter either the account number or the retirement plan number.

DPPastYrInterestPdYTD.description: Interest paid last year on account.

DPAmtOfCreditsCtd.description: Total amount of credits cycle to date.

DPTotFlt.description: Total collectable float plus clearinghouse funds at the beginning of the current business day (after the buckets have been rolled).

DPCategory.description:
Deposit category.  
 D  Demand deposit account.  
 N  NOW, super NOW.  
 M  Money market.  
 S  Savings.  
 T  Time deposit open account.  
 C  Certificate of deposit.  
 R  Repurchase agreement.  
 L  Line of credit.

LN232PayoffTotAmt.description: Amount due to pay off the loan.

LNNColVinSerialNbr.description: Used to track the identification number of an indirectly sold item.

DPAnnPercentageYldEarnLstCyc.description: Annual percentage yield earned last cycle.

DPOpenInd.description:
Account open indicator.  
 Blank  Open account.  
 B  Closed by bank.  
 C  Closed by customer.  
 E  Pending closed by customer.  
 K  Pending closed by bank.  
 P  Closed by processing.  
 Z  Zero balance account.

LNLNCat.description:
Broad classification for identifying loans with similar processing characteristics. 
 C  Commercial.  
 F  Floor plan.  
 G  General accounts receivable.  
 I  Installment. 
 M  Mortgage.  
 P  Purchased loan.  
 R  Revolving credit.  
 S  Specific accounts receivable.

CIAcctMaintDte.description: Date maintenance was last performed on account.

 P  Purged.

DPFlt1BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: One business day available float amount as of start of day.

MLoanHazPaidYTD.description: Hazard insurance paid year to date.

 RP  Relationship Packaging 
 SB  Safe Deposit Box

MLoanTaxPdPrYrAmt.description: Amount of taxes paid last year.

DPTDPnltyAmt.description: Amount of penalty assessed on withdrawal before maturity.

DPFlt3BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Three business days available float amount as of start of day.

DPFlt11BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Eleven business day available float amount as of start of day.

 N  No, do not secure account information.

Special status codes assigned to the account.

 G  Stolen or lost checks or passbook.  
 H  Deceased party.

LNStat.description: Indicates whether the loan is partially or completely charged off, and whether the loan is earning interest.  May also identify the reason for nonaccrual or charge-off status.  See Loans Reference Manual for a complete list of status codes.

DPIntStatedRte.description: Rate of interest assigned to account.

NxtPmtDte.description: Due date of the earliest unpaid bill.

DPFlt7BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Seven business day available float amount as of start of day.

Code to identify which type of identification number was entered in the VIN/Serial Number field.

 S  Serial number.  
 Blank  No identification number entered.

LNNColMake.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the make of the item held for collateral.

NxtPmtAmt.description: Amount of the earliest unpaid bill.

DPNbrOfDebitsCTD.description: Number of debits cycle to date.

MLoanPrinPaidYTD.description: Amount of principal paid this year.

CIAcctClsDte.description: Date account was closed on CIS.

NbrOfDayPastDueTdy.description: Number of days past due today.  Does not reflect any payments made today.

LNCollDesc.description: User-defined description of collateral supporting the loan.

DPAvailBal.description: The amount of funds available for withdrawal.  Calculated as ledger balance minus holds minus float plus unused PRA plus/minus today's on-line transactions plus related account's available balance if applicable.

DPFlt4BusDayAvailFltAmt.description: Four business days available float amount as of start of day.

Kywrd.description: Keyword associated with the new data.  For a complete list of keywords, see 'Keyword List' in the Appendix of the User Manual.

AcctNbr.description: Account number associated with the keyword.

NewData.description: The new value for the keyword.  Each data type has its own range of size and content.  Data is entered from the left.  Punctuation is necessary for fields containing dollar values to ensure accuracy.

KywrdDesc.description: A short description of the keyword that was processed.

FeeID.description: Fee plan and fee number.  The first two characters identify the fee plan and the following three digits identify the fee number.

NoteNbr.description: Note number associated with the keyword.

NmeAddrNbr.description: Number corresponding to the name/address record (1-9).

AcctSum.description:
Account summary type.
 S Short-Term Notes
 L Long-Term Notes

AcctNme.description: The name of the account whose keyword value changed.

LNNmeAndAddrInd.description: Number from 1 through 9 identifying the name/address record.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrNmeNewChg.description: Part of the confirmation message from the host.  Returns either 'NEW,' 'CHANGED,' or 'DELETED' to indicate what action was performed on the name/address record.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrZIP2.description: Last four digits of customer's ZIP code if providing the full nine digits.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrZIP1.description: First five digits of customer's ZIP code.

LNAcctNme.description: The name associated with the account.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrBusPhLgth.description: Length of customer's business phone number. For internal use only.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrHmPhLgth.description: Length of customer's home phone number. For internal use only.

LNNewChangedNmeAddrLNAssmpDte.description: Date the loan was assumed, if applicable.

AcctType.description: Account type to generate loan account number for, based on bank control.

Branch.description: Branch number to generate loan account number for, based on bank control.

TrackCode.description: User-defined code that indicates the importance or status level of the memo.

TypeCode.description:
Indicates whether the category is predefined or user-defined.  
 S  Predefined.  
 U  User-defined.

UserID.description: The name of the user who last updated the memo.

Cat.description: The category associated with the memo.

UpdateTime.description: The time on the memo update date that the memo was last updated.  Represented as HH.MM.SS.

UpdateDte.description: The date the memo was last updated.  Represented as CCYY-MM-DD.

LiabAmt.description: Dollar amount or percentage, as specified in the liability indicator field, of the account or note being guaranteed or endorsed. Zero if liability is unlimited.

AcctNbr.description: Identifies the account assuming the indirect liability.

LiabTyp.description:
Identifies the type of liability.  
 A  Affiliate.  
 C  Common guarantor.  
 D  DBA/sole owner.  
 E  Endorsed.  
 G  Guaranteed.  
 J  Joint.  
 M  Employee.  
 O  Cosigner.  
 P  Partnership.  
 R  Recourse.  
 S Subsidiary.

ConfLiabBal.description: Current amount of the indirect liability.

LiabInd.description:
Specifies how the liability limit is expressed, or if it is unlimited.  
  1  Unlimited.  
 2  Dollar limit.  
 3  Percentage limit.

ConfLiabLmt.description: Dollar amount or percentage, as specified in the liability indicator field, of the account or note being guaranteed or endorsed. Zero if liability is unlimited.

NoteNbr.description: Identifies the note being guaranteed or endorsed. Blank if entire account is guaranteed or endorsed.

BenAcctNbr.description: Identifies the account being guaranteed or endorsed.

ConfLiabDte.description: Date the indirect liability was established.

ConfAcctNme.description: Short name of the account holder benefiting from the indirect liability.

BnkShr.description: Bank share.  Calculated as note balance minus participation balance.

BkrptInd.description:
With the exception of the following system-defined values, a user-defined code intended to indicate the form of bankruptcy the customer has filed. 
0  No bankruptcy 
1   Chapter 7 
2   Chapter 11 
3   Chapter 12 
4   Chapter 13

NoteCat.description:
Indicates loan type.
 
 C Commercial.
 E Student loan.
 F Floor plan.
 G General accounts receivable.
 I Installment.
 M Mortgage.
 P Purchased loan.
 R Revolving credit.
 S Specific accounts receivable.

NoteAccrStat.description:
Identifies the accrual status of the loan.
 
 A Accrual
 B Nonaccrual; bankruptcy.
 C Complete charge-off.
 CA Partial charge-off;accrual.
 CB Partial charge-off; bankruptcy.
 CD Charge-off/deferred (active).
 CJ Partial charge-off; judgment.
 CN Partial charge-off; nonaccrual.
 CR Partial charge-off; repossession.
 DA Deferred (active).
 J Nonaccrual; judgment.
 N Nonaccrual; no special status.
 R Nonaccrual; repossession.

CurBal.description: Unpaid principal balance on processing date.

BkrptDte.description: Date the note was placed in bankruptcy status.

NoteBal.description: Loan balance.  For loans with a nonaccrual or charge-off status, this reflects the actual customer balance.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr4.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr5.description: Output of information for use within error message.

 T  Tiered; notes accrue at multiple rates for various balance portions.

 9  30-day month/365-day year.

LNActPIAmtErr5.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPIAmtErr6.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNNoteTyp.description: Identifies a set of note options and defaults, as defined on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

LNActPIAmtErr7.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNChrgAcct.description: Identifies the DDA or savings account to which bills are charged.

Identifies the cost of funds accrual basis.  
 0  Actual-day month/360-day year.  
 3  30-day month/360-day year.  
 5  Actual-day month/365-day year.  
 7  Actual-day month/actual-day year.

LNActPrinAndIntAmtErr3.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPrinAndIntAmtErr2.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPrinAndIntAmtErr1.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNAccrMethInd.description:
Identifies the balance on which the loan accrues interest.  
 A  Actual principal balance.  
 Y  Current principal less current escrow balance.

LNStrtIntDte.description: Date, if other than the loan issue date, when interest begins to accrue on simple interest loans, using the start accrual option specified on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

Indicates whether Collection Referral Cards (R-6387) are generated for the loan.  
 N  Collection Referral Cards are not generated.  
 Y  Collection Referral Cards are generated if the COLLECTION REFERRAL CARDS field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control is Y.
