Indicates whether the endorser receives late notices.  
 N  Endorser does not receive late notices.  
 Y = Endorser receives late notices if the LATE NOTICE ENDORSER field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control is Y.

LNPrchId.description: Code that identifies a group of loan purchases.

LNSmsProg.description: Identifies the Secondary Marketing System program to which the loan is assigned on the Loan Origination System.

LNFhlbMtgInd.description:
Identifies the type of mortgage for FHLBB reporting.  Defaults to 1 for mortgage loans (Loan Category M).  
 1  First mortgage. 
 2  Second mortgage; reporting institution holds all preceding liens; reported as first mortgage on Schedule H.  
 3-9, A-Z  User-defined; reported as second mortgage on Schedule H.

SBAStatus.description:
Indicates the state of the loan.  Values are defined by Colson Services.  
 4  Deferred.  
 5  In liquidation.  
 6  Paid in full.  
 7  Transferred.  
 8  Purchased by SBA.  
 9  Fully undisbursed.  
 Space  Current to 60 days delinquent.

LNCelng1Ovr.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, the highest rate at which the loan can accrue interest.

LNFhlbRteCap.description:
Identifies an adjustable rate mortgage loan's maximum interest rate change per adjustment period.  
 05  Less than .5%.  
 10  At least .5%, but less than 1%.  
 15  At least 1%, but less than 1.5%. 
 20  At least 1.5%, but less than 2%.  
 25  At least 2%, but less than 2.5%.  
 30  At least 2.5%, but less than 3%.  
 35  At least 3%, but less than 3.5%. 
 40  At least 3.5%, but less than 4%.  
 45  At least 4%.  
 99  No per-period rate cap.

LNDlrResrvAmt.description: For financed and prepaid dealer reserves, the amount of interest prepaid to the dealer.

LNNxtRteChgDte.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, date when the rate is next eligible to change.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNApprslAmt.description: Whole dollar amount of the current appraised value of the property.

LNFlr1Ovr.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, the lowest rate at which the loan can accrue interest.

LNFeePlnDflt.description: Indicates whether to use the fee plan default values established on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.  Y or N.

LNSbaInd.description:
Indicates whether the borrower is a small business or small farm, and if the loan is guaranteed by the Small Business Administration.  
 N  Neither.  
 R  Small farm, not guaranteed by the SBA.  
 S  Small business, not guaranteed by the SBA.  
 Y  Small business, guaranteed by the SBA.

LNBasis.description: Indicates the accrual basis of the note.  Only a basis code of 3 (30-day month, 360-day year) can be used as the basis for the amortization schedule.

LNFeePln.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNFeeAmtOvride.description: Used with the flat fee plan override number; the corresponding flat fee dollar amount to override.

LNFhlbCollCls.description: Identifies the FHLBB collateral class assigned to the pledged loan.  For a complete list of collateral class codes, see 'FHLBB Collateral Class Codes' in the Loans Appendix.

LNCalculatedDlrResrvAmt.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNMrgnOvrideInd.description: For variable-plan loans, indicates whether the value in the index relationship field overrides the margin defined on Variable Plan Segment 460 of Bank Control.

LNFeePln3.description: See business description for LN Fee Plan 1.

LNFeePln2.description: See business description for LN Fee Plan 1.

LNSectActOfFha.description: Identifies the type of FHA loan.

LNFeePln1.description: Fee Plan 1 through Fee Plan 3 identify up to three fee plans for this note as defined on Fee Plan Segment 430 of Bank Control.

LNIntAmt.description: Total expected interest for the term of the note.  For add-on loans, the actual interest amount.  For simple interest loans, the anticipated interest amount.

CreditBurComment.description: Special comment code that is used in conjunction with the credit bureau status code to further define the account condition, such as closed account, account in dispute, adjustment pending, etc.  These codes are defined by the Consumer Data Industry Association.

LNPrptyNmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to the property address.

LNIntRte1Ovr.description: For loans with a fixed rate, the rate at which the loan accrues interest. For split-rate or rate plan loans, the accrual rate on any balance up  to and including the split rate limit. For variable-rate or variable-plan loans, the current rate at which the loan accrues interest.

LNConversionOptDte.description: Date the option to convert to a fixed rate expires.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNIssDte.description: Effective date of the loan.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNPartBoughtBnkNbr.description: For purchased notes, identifies the company from which the loan was purchased.

LNPMICanclDte.description: Date on which borrower is eligible to request PMI cancellation.  Should represent when the loan is first scheduled to reach an 80% LTV.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNFhlbIndxCde.description:
Identifies the parameter upon which an ARM loan's interest rate adjustments are based.  
 001  National average mortgage contract rate--monthly. 
 002  National average cost of funds--semiannual.  
 003  National median cost of funds--monthly.  
 004  Eleventh district cost of funds--monthly.  
 005  Eleventh district cost of funds--semiannual. 
 006  One-year treasury note.  
 007  Five-year treasury note.  
 008  Three-month T-bills (discount basis).  
 009  Six-month T-bills (discount basis).  
 010  California semiannual cost of funds.

LNBillTyp.description:
Controls the way bill segments are created and affects how payments are applied.  
 0  Bill-cycled (without bill segments); floor plan (floor plan indicator on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is 0).  
A  Due date-to-due date or amortizing.  
 B  Bill-cycled (with bill segments).  
 C  Payment date-to-payment date.  
 F  Bill-cycled (with bill segments); floor plan (floor plan indicator on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control is 2).

RCIntOnlyInd.description: Indicator on the loan system that allows banks to identify loans that need to have a special message printed on loan statements if a revolving credit loan is secured by real estate.

LNNoteCRBPortfolioTyp.description:
Credit bureau format defined type used for reporting the condition of the note required for legal compliance according to the Fair Credit Reporting Act.
 
 C Line of Credit
 I Installment
 M Mortgage
 O Open
 R Revolving

LNPmtSpreadMeth.description:
Identifies how payments are distributed.  
 A  Ascending sequential by payment priority number.  
 D  Descending sequential by payment priority number.  
 P  Prorata.

IntNotifyDays.description: Indicates the number of days before the first Payment Change Date  the customer is notified of estimated future rate and payment change through an Initial Adjustment Notice.

LNNoteComb68071098Ind.description:
The R6807/1098 Combined Indicator determines whether or not 1098 statement information will be combined with the R6807 annual statement generated at year end.
 
 Y Yes, combine 1098 statement information with R6807 annual statement
 N No, do not combine 1098 statement information with R6807 annual statement

LNHudFrml2BuydwnAmt.description: Government buydown amount as calculated using HUD Formula 2.

LNEscrIntPln.description: Identifies the escrow interest plan associated with the loan, as defined on Escrow Interest Plan Segment 465 of Bank Control.

LNDfltRteInd.description: Indicates whether this note uses the automated default rate feature as defined on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.  Y or N.

LNIntCapitalizationInd.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, indicates whether unpaid interest is capitalized on the statement creation date.  Y or N.

LNCOFIndx.description: Identifies the index used to calculate the cost of funds, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

LNCollPct.description: Percentage of the loan balance that must be secured by collateral.

LNSplitRteLmt.description: For split-rate or rate plan loans, the dividing point for the interest rate.  A note balance over this amount accrues at the loan rate 2  and a note balance up to and including this amount accrues at the loan rate 1.

LNTaxEquivalencyInd.description: User-defined code intended to denote a tax-free loan.

LNPoints.description: Amount charged by the lender at origination.

LNReportingRgn.description: User-defined code intended to identify a reporting region for loans associated with multiple branches.

LNFhaCaseNbr.description: Indicates the FHA, VA, or PMI case number (including hyphen).

LNBnkCntlDfltEscrAnlysInd.description: Indicates escrow analysis option indicator defaulted from Bank Control.

LNVarRteExtnInd.description: Indicates whether the note is eligible for an automatic extension of the maturity date.  Will be reset from Y to N once the maturity date extension has occurred.

CntrtTyp1.description: Code that specifies the type of mortgage granted or being applied for.  Identifies how the loan is categorized on reports used in HAMP reporting.

LNMgmtCls.description: Used for grouping loans for classification purposes, as defined on Classification Segment 415 of Bank Control.

LNCalculatedIntAmt.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNOccupantInd.description:
For real estate loans, indicates whether the property is owner-occupied.  Defaults to Y for mortgage loans (Loan Category M); defaults to 0 for all other loans.  
 Y  Owner-occupied.  
 N  Not owner-occupied.  
 0  Not applicable.  
 2  Second home.

LNNColVinSerialCode.description:
Code to identify which type of identification number was entered in the VIN/Serial Number field.  
 V  Vehicle identification number.  
 S  Serial number.  
 Blank  No identification number entered.

LNConversionOptFee.description: Flat fee or calculated amount, as determined by the conversion option fee indicator, assessed if the note is converted to a fixed rate.

LNDfctCmmtNbr.description: Identifies the subcommitment whose commitment current amount will be updated by the amount of the draw generated by the IFMS deficit transfer.

LNFeeAmortizationToDte.description: Date to which the FASB fees are amortized, if other than the loan maturity date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNAmortizationEditCde.description: Indicates whether amortization edits were performed when the loan was set up.   Y or N.

LNDlvryDte.description: For loans secured by real estate and held for sale on the secondary market, date of the firm purchase commitment.  Used on the RC-J Repricing report (R-6543).  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNEscrAnlysOptInd.description: Indicates whether escrow analysis is processed.  This field automatically changes from N to Y on the escrow analysis option reset date.

LNEscNxtEscrAnlysPmtEffDte.description: Date the escrow payment changes as a result of the next scheduled escrow analysis.  Report sort word LNENXEF.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNIncmAmt.description: For buydown loans, the mortgagor's annual income.

LNNegAmortizationInd.description: For variable-plan loans, indicates whether the loan is allowed to go into negative amortization.  Y or N.

LNBillNmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record(s) to which copies of bills are sent.  Defaults to 1.

LNConversionOptFeeInd.description:
Identifies the basis of the conversion option fee.  
 CB  Percentage of the current balance.  
 FF  Flat fee.  
 OB  Percentage of the original balance.  
 OT  Other.

LNIndx.description: For variable-rate loans, identifies the index number used to calculate the interest rate, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

LNRptToHmdaInd.description: Indicates whether the loan appears on the Loan Application Register (R-6881, R-6882).  Y or N.

LNApplScr.description: For dealer-financed loans, the application score assigned by an external credit system.

LNTimesRenewedInd.description: Number of times the note has been renewed.

LNCollCde.description: With the exception of the system-defined values of A or blank for the first digit, two-digit user-defined code identifying the loan collateral.  If the first digit is A or blank, the loan is reported to the credit bureau as unsecured; for all other values, the loan is reported as secured.

LNRegZInd.description: Indicates whether the loan must comply with Regulation Z.  If the indicator is Y, the APR is printed on the Loan Statement (R-6090).  Y or N.

LNCalculatedPrinAndIntAmtErr2.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCalculatedPrinAndIntAmtErr3.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNFhlbBldgCde.description:
Two-digit code used to categorize loans for FHLBB reporting.  The first digit indicates how the loan is categorized on reports.  The second digit is user-defined.  The following codes are assigned for the first digit; other first-digit values are classified as 'permanent' on reports.  
 1  Permanent.  
 2  Construction.  
 3  Permanent; newly built.

LNCalculatedPrinAndIntAmtErr1.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNAutoPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether automatic payments are processed and whether overdrafts are allowed. 
 0  No automatic payments processed.  
 1  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts not allowed.  
2  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts allowed. 
3  Automatic payments processed; overdrafts allowed which will automatically process through Exceptions Desktop or On-Line Exceptions.

LNPMIMidpointDte.description: Midpoint date represents the final date at which lender is required to discontinue PMI coverage if cancellation or termination has not occurred first.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNCelng1Undr.description: For split-rate or rate plan loans, the highest rate on any balance over the split-rate limit at which the loan can accrue interest.

RndInd.description: Indicates whether the re-amortized payment can be rounded up to the nearest dollar on a Category R loan.  Y or N.

LNAchAcctTyp.description:
Identifies the type of account from which ACH payments are drawn.  
C  Checking.  
 S  Savings.

LNConversionOptDteInd.description: Indicates whether the borrower has an option to convert to a fixed rate.

LNRteChgFreq.description: For variable-rate loans, determines when the note interest rate changes based on changes to the related index.

LNCOFStlmtTerm.description: Used with the cost of funds settlement frequency field, determines the amount of time between the last settlement date and the next settlement date.

LNCstOfFundsCelng.description: For variable-rate loans, the highest rate at which funds accrue.

LNNColModel.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the model of the item held for collateral.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr9.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNTerm.description: Number of months between loan issue date and loan maturity date.

R6066CFPBInd.description: Indicator signifying whether this loan qualifies to have the R-6066 Pending Change Notice produced in CFPB format.  Y or N.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr5.description: Output of information for use within error message.

SECType.description:
Standard Entry Class code for ACH loan payments.  
 PPD  Pre-arranged payment and deposit entry.  
 CCD  Cash concentration or disbursement.

LNCstOfFundsMrgn.description: For variable-rate loans, the amount the note is floating over or under the cost-of-funds interest rate.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr6.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr7.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr8.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr1.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCOFStlmtFreq.description:
Used with the cost of funds settlement term field, indicates the amount of time between the last settlement date and the next settlement date.  
 0  Manual change.  
 1  Daily.  
 2  Monthly.  
 3  Yearly.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr2.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr3.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr4.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNSecuredInd.description:
Indicates whether the loan is secured by collateral on the Collateral System.  For institutions with officer lending limits established on Officer Segment 110 of Bank Control, also indicates whether the loan is secured. 
 B  Secured, but collateral not on Collateral System.  
 S  Secured with collateral on Collateral System.  
 U  Unsecured.

LNComaker2NmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to comaker #2.

LNFrgnCrncyCde.description: User-defined code intended to designate the type of currency associated with a letter of credit.

LNWhseInd.description: Indicates whether the note appears on the SDC Warehousing Interface report (R-7230) and the SDC Secondary Marketing Module.

LNIntAmtForErrMsg.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNEscrAnlysOptRstDte.description: Date the system will change the escrow analysis option indicator from N to Y.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNCurtlInd.description:
For Bill Type A loans with a monthly payment frequency, indicates how curtailments (principal reductions) are effective dated. 
 0  Curtailment effective date is the current processing date.  For sold loans, the curtailment effective date is the payment date.  
 1  Curtailment effective date is the effective date of the last payment, excluding paid-ahead payments. 
 2  Curtailment effective date is the current processing date.  
 3  Curtailment effective date is the effective date of the payment, including paid-ahead payments.

LNOvheadCstTyp.description: User-defined code intended to define the method used to calculate overhead costs during profitability analysis.

LNInsResrvAmt.description: For voluntary insurance, the monthly premium amount due.  For financed insurance reserves, the premium for the term of the loan.

LNHPACde.description:
Code identifying loans that are subject to the HPA (Homeowner's Protection Act).  
 F  Subject to HPA; classified high risk by FNMA or FHLMC.
 G  Subject to HPA; classified high risk by FNMA or FHLMC; with auto cancellation. 
 H  Subject to HPA; classified high risk by lender. 
 I  Subject to HPA; classified high risk by lender; with auto cancellation. 
 L  Subject to HPA; has Lender Paid Mortgage Insurance.  
 N  Not applicable (not reported on R-6010, Maintenance Cross Check Report).  
 X  Once was subject to HPA, but PMI has been discontinued (not reported on R-6010, Maintenance Cross Check Report).  
 Y  Subject to HPA cancellation and termination rights. 
 Z  Subject to HPA; with auto cancellation.

LNCalculatedOrigBal.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNNxtExpdEscrAnlysDte.description: Next expected escrow analysis date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNCalculatedTotPmtAmt.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNUccFilingDte.description: Date the current UCC filing expires.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNFhlbPrptyTyp.description:
Two-digit code used to categorize loans for FHLBB reporting.  The first digit indicates how the loan is categorized on reports.  The second digit is user-defined.  The following codes are assigned for the first digit; other first-digit values are classified as 'other' on reports.  
 1  Single family.  
 2  Two- to four-family.  
 3  Five or more units. 
 4  Land.  
 5  Nonresidential.  
 6  Condominium; reported as single family.  
 7  Planned unit development (PUD); reported as single family.  
 8  Leasehold; reported as single family.

LNChrgInd.description:
For automatic bill payments, indicates the type of account to which a bill is charged.  
 A  Automated Funds Transfer System.  
 D  DDA.  
 S  Savings.

LNCstOfFundsFlr.description: For variable-rate loans, the lowest rate at which funds accrue.

LNDPAcctNbr.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, identifies the deposit account from which checks are drawn to access the loan.

LNRlt1Ovr.description:
For variable-rate or variable-plan loans.  Indicates if the loan's rate is floating above or below or as a percentage of the index.  
 +  Rate is floating above the index.  
 -  Rate is floating below the index.  
 %  Rate is floating as a percentage of the index.

LNCalculatedInsResrvAmt.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNComaker3NmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to comaker #3.

LNHldRlseDay.description: Number of calendar days, from 0 through 14, after the payment posting date that a temporary hold expires.  If blank,defaults from Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

LNOrigLeadLndrBal.description: For purchased loans, original balance of the loan at the originating institution.

LNRiskRtg.description: User-defined code intended to identify the level of risk associated with the loan.

LNEmplrNmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to an employer.

LNNoteOBPOvride.description: Indicates whether option-based pricing billing schedule override is used.  Y or N.

LNNoteClosOvride.description:
Indicates whether this note is to remain open when it reaches zero balance.  
 N  Note does not remain open.  
 Y  Note remains open.  If payment tran code 650-659 is used, the note is marked paid and closes even if the field is Y.

LNCmmtNbr.description: Identifies the commitment associated with the loan.

LNNColVinSerialNbr.description: Used to track the identification number of an indirectly sold item.

LNNbrOfCoupons.description: For loans other than variable-plan or escrow analysis, number of coupons to be included in the coupon book.  May default from Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

LNOffcrNbr.description: Identifies the primary officer responsible for the loan, as defined on Officer Segment 110 of Bank Control.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr11.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNLNCat.description:
Broad classification for identifying loans with similar processing characteristics. 
 C  Commercial.  
 F  Floor plan.  
 G  General accounts receivable.  
 I  Installment. 
 M  Mortgage.  
 P  Purchased loan.  
 R  Revolving credit.  
 S  Specific accounts receivable.

LNPrchAmt.description: Principal balance of the loan when it was purchased from another financial institution.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr12.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr10.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr15.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNLtNotcInd.description:
Indicates whether late notices are generated.  
 N  Late notices are not generated.  
 Y  Late notices are generated if the LATE NOTICE field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control is Y.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr13.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNCstOfFundsRte.description: For fixed- and variable-rate loans, the internal interest rate charged to your institution for the use of funds.

LNCalculatedPIAmtErr14.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNInvstrCde.description:
Identifies the owner of the mortgage.   
 0  No investor.  
 A  Alaska Housing Authority.  
 D  Other; principal breakdown calculated to the actual percentage sold rather than a whole percentage.  
 F  FNMA.  
 G  GNMA.  
 H  HUD.  
 I  Other investor.  
 M  FHLMC. 
 N  Maine State Housing Authority.  
 O  Other investor.  
 V  VA.  
 W  WHEDA (Wisconsin Housing and Economic Development Authority).

LNPartSyndInd.description:
Identifies the loan as a participation or syndication.  
 0  Neither.  
 P  Participation.  
 S  Syndication.

LNNmeAddrInd.description: Used to assign a name/address record to the note and identifies the name/address record to which the original bill is sent.  Defaults to 1.

LNRightToCureSt.description:
For Kansas and Missouri banks, a value in this field indicates that right-to-cure notices may be sent to borrowers during the life of the loan.  The RIGHT TO CURE NOTICE field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control must be I or R. 
 KS  Kansas.  
 MO  Missouri.

LNScndyNAICSCde.description: Identifies the secondary NAICS (North American Industrial Classification System) code assigned to the loan.

LNCstCntr.description: Identifies the cost center to which the loan is assigned.

LNPrchDte.description: Date the loan was purchased from another financial institution.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNHmdaStCntyCde.description: Identifies the state and county code for HMDA reporting purposes.  Represented as xx###, where the first two digits are the numeric state code and the last three digits are the standard county code.

LNOrigAdtnlChrg.description: Other charges financed for the customer, excluding interest, insurance, and reserves.

LNFtrBasisDte.description: Date the future loan accrual basis becomes effective.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNLeadTmeDay.description: For notes with a lead time indicator of Y, indicates the number of days prior to the due date that a bill is produced.

LNCstOfFundsRlt.description:
For variable-rate loans, defines the relationship between the margin over and the index.  
 +  Margin added to the index rate. 
 -  Margin subtracted from the index rate.  
 %  Margin floated as a percentage of the index rate.

LNExpdMatDte.description: For variable-plan loans, or variable-rate loans using the payment/term change feature, date of expected maturity. Used by the system to amortize the balance of the loan when changing payment amounts. If the expected maturity date is in the past or is zeroes, the system uses the loan maturity date to amortize the balance of the loan.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNEscrBal.description: Total current balance of all collected escrows related to the note.

LNRlt1Undr.description: For split-rate or rate plan loans, indicates whether the loan's rate on any balance over the split-rate limit is floating above (+), below (-), or as a percentage (%) of the index.

LN1098Ind.description:
Indicates whether this note is eligible for 1098 reporting at year end.  
 N  Note is not eligible for 1098 reporting. 
 Y  Note is eligible for 1098 reporting.  
 Z  Certified educational loan is eligible for 1098-E reporting.

LNHudFrml1BuydwnAmt.description: Government buydown amount as calculated using HUD Formula 1.

LNCOFNxtStlmtDte.description: Date the cost of funds accrual amount is next scheduled to be set to zeros.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNEscrAcctNbr.description: If escrow interest is paid using the Deposit System, identifies the escrow account on the Deposit System.  A value of all nines appears if the escrow interest is paid through the Loan System.

LNFedCallCde.description: Code identifying the loan classification for Federal call reporting purposes, as defined on Classification Segment 415 of Bank Control.

LNPrptySalesPrc.description: Whole dollar amount of the sale price of the property.

LNNoteRteExprDte.description: User-defined date on which the interest rate for an option-based borrowing will expire.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNEscrAnlysPlnNbr.description: Identifies the escrow analysis plan associated with the analysis, as defined on Escrow Analysis Plan Segment 470 of Bank Control.

LNBalAdviceInd.description: Indicates whether a Principal Balance Advice (R-6052) is produced when a transaction within the balance advice transaction range defined on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control produces a change in the principal balance.  Y or N.

LNFlatFeePln.description: Identifies the fee plan number, as defined on Fee Plan Segment 430 of Bank Control, that overrides the flat fee for the note.

LNCrBurReportingInd.description:
Indicates whether the loan is reported to a credit bureau. 
 N  Loan is not reported to a credit bureau.  
 Y  Loan is reported to a credit bureau if the CREDIT BUREAU REPORTING field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control is Y.

LNFnlScr.description: For dealer-financed loans, the final score assigned by an external credit system.

LNMrgn1Ovr.description: For variable-rate or variable-plan loans.  If LN Relationship 1 (Over) = + or -, the number of points above or below the index at which the rate is floating.  If LN Relationship 1 (Over) = %, the percentage of the index at which the rate is floating.

LNLendingLmtOvride.description: Enter 'Y' to override the Bank Lending Dollar Limit defined on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control.  You cannot override the dollar limit unless the system has generated a message indicating a transaction will force the loan to exceed the bank lending limit.

LNUsrFlg2.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

SBABasisPoint.description: A percentage value used in the calculation of the FTA Guaranteed Portion Payment in Field #10 of the 1502 SBA report.

LNUsrFlg1.description: User-defined code used to group accounts for reporting purposes.

LNPrtBoughtOvrLendingLmtInd.description: For purchased loans, indicates whether the loan was sold because it exceeded the lending limit of the originating bank.  Y or N.

LNAbaRoutNbr.description: Routing number for the institution funding ACH transactions for this loan.

LNNetProceeds.description: Original loan proceeds received by the borrower.

DealrCalcRte.description: Dealer calculation rate.  Used to assist in automatically calculating the reserve rate and bank rate.  Format:  xxx.xxxxxx.

LNActPIAmtErr15.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNUsrFlg5.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNUsrFlg4.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNActPIAmtErr13.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNUsrFlg3.description: See business description for LN User Flag 1.

LNActPIAmtErr14.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPIAmtErr11.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPIAmtErr12.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNActPIAmtErr10.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNRtePln.description: Identifies a specific rate plan record to which the note is tied, as defined on Rate Plan Segment 455 of Bank Control.

LNLeadTmeInd.description:
Indicates whether the bill lead time days is established at the note level or defaults from Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.  
 Y  Established at note level.  
 N  Defaults from Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.

LNOnlnColSysActyInd.description:
Indicates the status of the note on the Collection System.  
 A  Note did not meet Collection System selection criteria but was forced on the Collection System by the use of selection keyword OCACTIVE.  
 N  Note is not on the Collection System, or is on the Collection System but is currently in a dormant status. 
 Y  Note is on the Collection System; information passed from the Loan System to the Collection System is updated daily.

LNAutoPartDistInd.description: Indicates whether payments applied to the note are automatically distributed to any participations sold.  Y or N.

LNFlr1Undr.description: For split-rate or rate plan loans, the highest rate on any balance over the split-rate limit at which the loan can accrue interest.

LNMrgn1Undr.description: For split-rate or rate plan loans. If the index relationship indicator is + or -, the number of points above or below the index at which the loan's rate on any balance over the split-rate limit is floating. If the index relationship indicator is %, the percentage of the index at which this rate is floating.

LNComaker1NmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to comaker #1.

LNAutoNonaccrualInd.description: Indicates whether the loan is automatically placed in nonaccrual status after reaching the number of days past due specified in the DAYS TO AUTO NON-ACCRUAL field on Note Option Segment 410 of Bank Control.  Y or N.

LNBllnLNInd.description:
For fixed rate balloon loans with original maturities of 5 years or less, indicates whether the loan is listed as an adjustable rate loan on the RC-J Repricing Report (R-6543).  For all balloon loans, indicates whether the Balloon Payment Notice (BPN) (R-6064) is sent, and if so, whether it indicates the customer has a contractual right to refinance the balloon payment.  
 1  Not adjustable; no BPN sent.  
 2  Adjustable; BPN indicates contractual right to refinance.  
 3  Adjustable; BPN indicates there is no contractual right to refinance.  
 4  Not adjustable; BPN indicates contractual right to refinance.  
 5  Not adjustable; BPN indicates no contractual right to refinance.  
 6  Adjustable; no BPN sent.

LNEscAutoOverageRfndInd.description:
Indicates whether a surplus will be automatically refunded.  
 Y  Note is eligible for automatic escrow surplus refunds.  
 N  Note is not eligible for automatic escrow surplus refunds. 
 0  Note does not have an active escrow, or the automatic surplus refund feature has been permanently turned off.  
 1  Note with a value of Y at generation has a qualifying surplus which will be processed on the automatic surplus refund date.  The system resets 1 to Y on the automatic surplus refund date.  
 2  Note has a qualifying surplus but the auto refund process has been stopped.

LNPrinTyp.description:
Broad indication of the initial loan term for reporting purposes. 
 D  Due on demand.  
 R  More than one year.  
 T  One year or less.  
 V  Revolving.

LNPmtReamortizationInd.description:
For revolving credit (Category R) Payment Type B loans, indicates whether payment reamortization occurs and under what conditions. 
 I  Payment reamortized as a result of note increases only. 
 N  No payment reamortizing occurs.  
 R  Payment reamortized as a result of rate changes only. 
 T  Based on the remaining term, payment reamortized as a result of rate changes or note increases.  
 Y  Payment reamortized as a result of rate changes or note increases.

LNOccupantStat.description:
Identifies the loan on the HUD Delinquent Loan report (R-6376). 
 1  Original owner-occupied.  
 2  Transfer owner-occupied.  
 3  Not owner-occupied.  
 4  Vacant (not secured).  
 5  Vacant (secured).  
 6  Adverse occupant.  
 A-Z  User-defined (not included in regulatory reporting).

LNBillAllIntInd.description:
For Bill Type B, Payment Type B loans, indicates whether interest billed includes all interest due when the interest due exceeds the scheduled payment amount. 
 Y  Bill includes all interest due.  
 N  Bill includes only the scheduled payment amount of interest.

LNDpstnCde.description:
Used to print a message on the Maturing Notes Review List (R-6290) indicating the disposition of the loan after maturity.  
 1  Expired line.  
 2  Pay in full.  
 3  Reduce and renew.  
 4  Renew. 
 5  Refer to officer.  
 6  Term.  
 7  Convert to installment.  
 8  Line of credit.  
 9  Revolving credit.  
 10  Overline commitment.

LNTcklrDte.description: The date you want the tickler to remind you of; the date the upcoming event comes due.  Cannot be less than today's date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNNColMake.description: Used to track an indirectly sold item's description by identifying the make of the item held for collateral.

LNVarPlnRndgInd.description:
Indicates how the new interest rate is rounded when a payment change is calculated.  
 0  No rounding. 
 1  Nearest rate.  
 2  Round up to the next rate.  
 3  Round down to the last rate.

LNSndNoBillInd.description:
Determines method of billing used for the loan.  
 A  Bill is addressed to customer address listed on the note.  
B  Bill is addressed in care of the financial institution.  
C  Coupons; no bills sent.  
 D  Automated charge through ACH.  
 E  Automated charge through ACH and bill addressed to customer address listed on the note.  
 L  Coupons for regular payments and bills for late charge fees.  
 N  None; bills or coupons not produced.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr14.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNIntTyp.description:
Identifies the interest accrual method.  
 A  Precomputed add-on interest.  
 D  Discount interest. 
 R  For revolving credit (Category R) loans only; simple interest in arrears on the average daily balance.  
 S  Simple interest in arrears.  
 V  Simple interest in advance.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr15.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPMITrmntDte.description: Date on which lender is required to discontinue PMI coverage; should represent the appropriate LTV (78% or 77%) depending on the loan's classification.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr12.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr13.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr10.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNPmtTermChgInd.description:
For variable-rate loans, indicates whether the payment schedule or loan term are subject to change.  
 0  No changes.  
 1  Payment amount changes when the rate changes.  
 2  Payment amount changes on the next rate change date, regardless of whether the rate changes.  
 3  Maturity date, term, and number of payments change when the rate changes; payment amount remains the same.

LNPmtSchedNbrErr11.description: Output of information for use within error message.

LNNoteBaseOptBorrInd.description:
Identifies the type of option-based borrowing.  
 B  Base borrowing.  
 O  Option borrowing.

LNAttorneyNmeAddrInd.description: Identifies the name/address record assigned to an attorney.

LNCollDesc.description: User-defined description of collateral supporting the loan.

LNFhaInd.description:
Used to identify an FHA loan.  
 0  Not an FHA loan.  
 F  FHA.  
 N  FHA and not escrowed.

LNRestructuredLNInd.description: User-defined field intended to indicate whether the loan has been restructured.

LNCstOfFundsInd.description: Indicates whether a cost-of-funds segment exists for the loan.

Basis.description:
Identifies the loan accrual basis.
 
 0 Actual day month and 360 day year.  
 3 30 day month and 360 day year.  
 5 Actual day month and 365 day year.  
 7 Actual day month and actual day year.  
 9 30 day month and 365 day year.

Mrgn.description: Rate margin.  For variable-rate loans.  Amount the note is floating over or under the cost-of-funds interest rate.

EffDte.description: Date the transaction becomes effective.  Format YYYY-MM-DD.

Indx.description: Index number.  For variable-rate loans.  Identifies the index number used to calculate the cost-of-funds interest rate, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

Rlt.description:
Rate relationship.  For variable-rate loans.  Defines the relationship between the rate margin and the index.
 
 + Number of points above the index.  
 - Number of points below the index.  
 % Percentage of the index at which the loan�s rate is floating.

BillAddDte.description: Date the bill was added to the system.

PICnstntNew.description: Total principal and interest portion of the bill.

NbrOfDayPmtWasLt.description: Total number of days late that this bill was paid.

ProjectedIntDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of the interest projected to be due.  For purchased loans, the initiating institution�s interest payment.

ProjectedPrinDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of the principal projected to be due.  For purchased loans, the initiating institution�s principal payment.

BuydwnNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of buydown billed.

BillSkipInd.description:
Indicates the bill status for skipping a payment.  
 A  Bill payment was skipped.  
 E  Bill is eligible to have a payment skipped.

LstBillUpdtDte.description: Date that this bill was last updated.

BillLTCHGEffectDte.description: Date the late charge assessment indicator was established.

BillSeqNbr.description: Identifies the account bill, if any, to which a note bill is tied.

VltryInsNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of voluntary insurance billed.

BillLTCHGAssessmentInd.description:
Indicates whether late charges are assessed one time per late payment.  
 Y  Late charge is assessed once for each missed payment.  
 N  Late charge is assessed each month until the payment is made.

RTCNotcIndSent.description:
For Missouri and Kansas banks, indicates whether a Right to Cure notice has been produced for this bill.  
 Blank  A Right to Cure notice has not been produced for this bill segment.  
 X  Bill segment is more than ten days past due, but a Right to Cure notice will not be created.  The maximum number of notices has been sent, or a previous bill segment with an outstanding notice exists.  
 Y  Right to Cure notice has been generated on this segment.

BillRecalcReprntInd.description:
Indicates whether this bill segment has been set to reprint or recalculate in end-of-day processing.  
 Blank  Neither.  
 C  Recalculate.  
 P  Reprint.

TotPrinBilledNotPd.description: Total principal amount billed not paid.

PdDte.description: Date the bill was paid in full.  For Bill Type A loans, the bill due date.

BillDeletionInd.description: Indicates whether the bill is marked for deletion.

AchPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether an ACH or autopay transaction has been sent for processing.  
 0  ACH or autopay transaction has not been created for this bill.  
 1  ACH or autopay transaction will be created tonight.  
 2  ACH or autopay transaction has been generated.  
 9  For revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  Billed amount is eligible for small balance waiver; no autopay transaction will be produced.

TotLstBilled.description: Dollar amount that was last billed on the note.

EndDte.description: Identifies the date of the last payment in the schedule.

PIAmt.description: For Bill Type A loans only, the fixed principal and interest portion of the payment.

LstUpdtDte.description: Date the payment schedule was last updated.

EOMInd.description: Indicates whether payments are due at the end of the month.  Y or N.

TotPmtAmt.description: Amount of total payment, not including buydowns, for this schedule.

Typ.description:
Identifies the type of payment schedule.   
 
 I  Interest only.  
 T  Total.

PmtTyp.description: Determines the payment method for the loan.  Valid values are 0, A-G, J, P.  See Loans Reference Volume 1, 'Payment Schedule Note Inquiry 234,' for more information.

AddDte.description: Date the payment schedule was added.

ChrgDdaNbr.description: Identifies the DDA or savings account to which a bill is charged.

PmtPct.description: Outstanding balance percentage billed.  For revolving credit (Category R) loans, the percentage to be used in calculating the amount billed.  For Payment Type P, defaults from Payment Plan Segment 420 of Bank Control.

Stat.description:
Indicates the status of the payment schedule.  
 
 C  Current.  
 E  Ended (past).  
 F  Future.

MinPmtAmt.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, the minimum payment amount to be billed.  For Payment Type P, defaults from Payment Plan Segment 420 of Bank Control.

NbrOfPayments.description: The number of bills produced in a past schedule, or the number of bills to be produced in a current or future schedule.

BuydwnAmt.description: For Bill Type A loans only, portion of the payment supplied by someone other than the borrower.

NbrPastPayments.description: Number of past payments in the schedule.

EscrAmt.description: Escrow amount included in the total payment.

PmtFreq.description:
Indicates the frequency of scheduled payments.  
 
 1  Monthly.  
 2  Quarterly.  
 3  Semiannually.  
 4  Annually.  
 5  At maturity.  
 6  Biweekly.  
 9  Irregular; creates a bill effective date on the payment schedule but does not affect the next bill date.

BusDay.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  Number representing the nth business day of the month on which the Revolving Credit Statement (R-6088) is produced.  Valid values are 1 through 18.  If this field is blank, statements are produced on the monthly anniversary date of the payment schedule effective date.

EffDte.description: Identifies the date of the first payment in the schedule.

NbrRemngPayments.description: Number of payments remaining in the schedule.

ChrgDdaInd.description:
For automatic bill payments, indicates the type of account to which a bill is charged.  
 
 D  DDA.  
 S  Savings.

PmtPlnNbr.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, identifies the payment plan used to calculate the payment, as defined on Payment Plan Segment 420 of Bank Control.

DelInd.description: A 'D' in this field indicates the payment schedule is marked for deletion.

LNRTCNotcIndEntd.description: Code indicating whether you are changing the value in LN Right To Cure Notice Indicator.  Y or N.

LNBuydwnNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the buydown portion of the bill.

LNPrinPmtBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill.  For Bill Types A and C, the total payment.

LNProjectedIntDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of the interest projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the interest portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's interest payment.

LNIntBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill that has not been paid.

LNPICnstntNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, total principal and interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P, the initiating institution's P&I.

LNVltryInsNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the voluntary insurance portion of the bill.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNRecalcReprntInd.description:
Indicates whether this bill segment has been set to reprint or recalculate in end-of-day processing.  
 Blank  Neither.
 C  Recalculate, up to the date the next bill segment is scheduled to drop.
 P  Reprint, up to and including the bill due date.

LNPdDte.description: Date the bill was paid in full.  For Bill Type A loans, the bill due date.

LNPmtFreqNew.description: Payment frequency on the payment schedule.  Required for notes with Interest Type V.

LNRTCNotcIndSent.description:
For Missouri and Kansas banks, indicates whether a Right to Cure notice has been produced for this bill.  
 Blank  A Right to Cure notice has not been produced for this bill. 
 X  Bill segment is more than ten days past due, but a Right to Cure notice will  not be created.  The maximum number of notices has been sent, or a previous bill segment with an outstanding notice exists.  
 Y  Right to Cure notice has been generated on this segment.
  The system automatically changes the indicator according to the above parameters.  If you manually change the indicator on a bill segment, you must also keyword change the following fields on the corresponding note:  LNNRTCNO, LNNRTCDT.

LNPrinPmtBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill that has not been paid.  For Bill Types A and C, the total amount that has not been paid.

LNIntBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P loans, this is your institution's portion of the interest.

LNAcctNme.description: The name associated with the account.

LNEscrBilled.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill.

LNDueDteNew.description: New bill date for a single bill.

LNProjectedPrinDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of principal projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the principal portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's principal  payment.

LNBillDte.description: Bill due date of the bill to be maintained.

LNAchPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether an ACH or autopay transaction has been sent for processing.  
 0  ACH or autopay transaction has not been created for this bill.  
 1  ACH or autopay transaction will be created tonight.  
 2  ACH or autopay transaction has been generated.  
 9  For revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  Billed amount is eligible for small balance waiver; no autopay  transaction will be produced.

LNEscrBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill that has not been paid.

UsgTyp.description:
Identifies the type of usage linked to the commitment.
 
 B  Banker's acceptance.  
 L  Letter of credit.  
 N  Note.  
 R  Revolving credit.

UsgLstChgDte.description: For Usage Type B or L, the system-generated date indicating the last change to the usage.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

EffDte.description: Date the transaction takes effect.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

RltCmmtUsgAcctNbr.description: Account number of the associated usage.

UsgMatDte.description: For Usage Type B or L, the maturity date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LendingLmtOvrideInd.description: For usages exceeding the bank lending limit established on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Control, indicates whether the lending limit is to be overridden.  Y or N.

NewCmmtNbr.description: Identifies the commitment to which the usage is to be tied, if applicable.

UsgAmt.description: For Usage Type B or L, the dollar amount of the usage.

LNRTCNotcIndEntd.description: Code indicating whether you are changing the value in LN Right To Cure Notice Indicator.  Y or N.

LNBuydwnNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the buydown portion of the bill.

LNPrinPmtBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill.  For Bill Types A and C, the total payment.

LNProjectedIntDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of the interest projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the interest portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's interest payment.

LNIntBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill that has not been paid.

LNPICnstntNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, total principal and interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P, the initiating institution's P&I.

LNVltryInsNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the voluntary insurance portion of the bill.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

Indicates whether this bill segment has been set to reprint or recalculate in end-of-day processing.  
 Blank  Neither.
 C  Recalculate, up to the date the next bill segment is scheduled to drop.
 P  Reprint, up to and including the bill due date.

LNPdDte.description: Date the bill was paid in full.  For Bill Type A loans, the bill due date.

LNPmtFreqNew.description: Payment frequency on the payment schedule.  Required for notes with Interest Type V.

For Missouri and Kansas banks, indicates whether a Right to Cure notice has been produced for this bill.  
 Blank  A Right to Cure notice has not been produced for this bill. 
 X  Bill segment is more than ten days past due, but a Right to Cure notice will  not be created.  The maximum number of notices has been sent, or a previous bill segment with an outstanding notice exists.  
 Y  Right to Cure notice has been generated on this segment.
  The system automatically changes the indicator according to the above parameters.  If you manually change the indicator on a bill segment, you must also keyword change the following fields on the corresponding note:  LNNRTCNO, LNNRTCDT.

LNPrinPmtBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill that has not been paid.  For Bill Types A and C, the total amount that has not been paid.

LNIntBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P loans, this is your institution's portion of the interest.

LNAcctNme.description: The name associated with the account.

LNEscrBilled.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill.

LNDueDteNew.description: New bill date for a single bill.

LNProjectedPrinDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of principal projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the principal portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's principal  payment.

LNBillDte.description: Bill due date of the bill to be maintained.

LNAchPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether an ACH or autopay transaction has been sent for processing.  
 0  ACH or autopay transaction has not been created for this bill.  
 1  ACH or autopay transaction will be created tonight.  
 2  ACH or autopay transaction has been generated.  
 9  For revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  Billed amount is eligible for small balance waiver; no autopay  transaction will be produced.

LNEscrBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill that has not been paid.

NbrAcctRltCust.description:
Input:  The maximum number, up to 25, of related customers to return information about.  If left blank, all customers related to the specified account will be returned.  If filled with a number less than the actual number of related customers, there is no message returned to indicate this, and there is no way to retrieve the next group of customers.  

 Output:  The actual number of related customers returned.  

 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

CIHistInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates that customer is related to historical accounts.

CICurStdAddr1Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 1 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.

AcctNbr.description: The account number to retrieve information on. Maximum length of 11.

CIBirthdate.description: Customer's date of birth.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD.

CICurStdNme03.description: Standardized text contained in line 3 of customer name record.

CICurNmePrcsTme.description: The time the customer's name/address record was last updated.

CICurStdAddr3Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 3 of customer address record.

CICurStdAddr5Cde.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Address 1 Code.

CICustCde1.description: Customer code 1, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde2.description: Customer code 2, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICurStdAddr4Cde.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Address 1 Code.

CICustTaxCde.description:
Code identifying the type of taxpayer identification number.  
 F  Federal taxpayer identification number.  
 N  No taxpayer identification number.  
 S  Social security number.  
 T  Individual taxpayer identification number.

CICustCde7.description: Customer code 7, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde8.description: Customer code 8, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde9.description: Customer code 9, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CIPrimEnt1toEnt2.description: Code indicating relationship of the account being inquired upon to this customer, as defined on Relationship Codes Segment 605 of Bank Control.

CICustCde3.description: Customer code 3, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CISSrcID.description: Identifies the medium through which the customer requested the new account.

CICustCde4.description: Customer code 4, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde5.description: Customer code 5, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde6.description: Customer code 6, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CISOfferID.description: The types of accounts that were advertised from the source.

CICurFrstNmeKeyFld2.description: Elementized first name search key field.

CIMoreToBeReturnedInd.description: A value of 'Y' here indicates account is related to more accounts than have been returned in this query.  To view the rest of the accounts, use the reposition fields described.

CICustCde12.description: Customer code 12, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde13.description: Customer code 13, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde14.description: Customer code 14, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde15.description: Customer code 15, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CIScndyPh.description: Customer's secondary phone number.  Format:  AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

CICurStdAddr2Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 2 of customer address record.

CICustCde10.description: Customer code 10, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CICustCde11.description: Customer code 11, as defined on Customer Codes Segment 610 of Bank Control.

CIPrspctInd.description: Indicates whether the customer number refers to a customer (C) or prospect (P).

CICurStdAddr3Cde.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Address 1 Code.

CICurStdAddr5Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 5 of customer address record.

NbrAccts.description:
Input:  The maximum number of accounts to return information about.  If left blank, all accounts related to the specified account will be returned.  

 Output:  The actual number of accounts returned.  

 For time deposit accounts, each time deposit ID is an occurrence within the structure.  The same is true for each note number within a loan account.

CIRltCustRltEffDte.description: The effective date on the account to customer relationship.

CISExtCustID.description: The customer ID used by a third party and FIS to manage account transfers from an external account to a FIS account.

RltApplNbr01.description: The account's primary customer number. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

CICurStdAddr1Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 1 of customer address record.

CICurMidNmeKeyFld3.description: Elementized middle name search key field.

CIPrmyPhNbr.description: Customer's primary (home) phone number.  Format:  AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

CtryCde.description: Identifies the country in which the address is located, using a standard alpha-3 ISO (International Organization for Standardization) country code.

CICurStdNmeCde03.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Name Code 1.

CICurStdAddr2Cde.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Address 1 Code.

CICurStdNmeCde02.description: See business description for CIS Current Standard Name Code 1.

CICurStdNmeCde01.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 1 of customer name record.  
 N  Name.  
 %  Legal title.

CICurLstNmeKeyFld1.description: Elementized last name search key field.

CIFaxPhNbr.description: Customer's fax phone number.  Format:  AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

CICurStdNme02.description: Standardized text contained in line 2 of customer name record.

CICurStdNme01.description: Standardized text contained in line 1 of customer name record.

CIPrimEnt2toEnt1.description:
Code indicating relationship of the account being inquired upon to this customer.  
 901  Primary.  
 902  Secondary.

CICurStdAddr4Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 4 of customer address record.

CmmtMoreInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates there are more commitments to be returned.

NbrOfCmmt.description: The actual number of commitments returned, up to 50.  If Number of Commitments is zero, there are no commitments related to the account, and no error messages will be returned.

RepoCmmtNbr.description: Will contain a value if there are more commitments to be returned.  To view the next set of commitments, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

iCommtyNme.description: The complete name of the NFIP community in which the property/building is located.

iResComInd.description:
Indicates if the property/building of the flood tracking record is residential or commercial.  
 C  Commercial.  
 R  Residential.

iCmpyAgent.description: The agent of the flood insurance company.

iMultLnCollInd.description: Indicates whether the property listed is used to secure multiple loans.  Y or N.

iInsExpDate.description: The expiration date of the insurance coverage.

iDtrmDte.description: The date when the flood zone determination was processed.

iCmpyState.description: The state of the flood insurance company address.

iLomaInd.description: Indicates whether a LOMA or LOMR has been issued by FEMA since the current map panel effective/revised date that revises the flood hazards affecting the building.  Y or N.

iRevisedDte.description: The NFIP Map Panel revisions date as shown on the NFIP map.

iLomaDate.description: The date of the LOMA or LOMR letter.

iNbrBldgs.description: Identifies how many buildings are on the property identified in the flood tracking record.

iReplaceAmt.description: Identifies the replacement cost of the property/building

iCertNbr.description: The flood insurance certificate or policy number.

PrptyNbr.description: User-defined number identifying the property used as collateral for the note.

iApprslAmt.description: The appraised value of the property/building listed on the flood tracking record.

FloodRec.description: User-defined number identifying the item associated with a specific user-defined property.

iCmmtyNbr.description: NFIP six-digit designation identifying each NFIP community.  The first two numbers are the state code.  The next four are the FIA-assigned community number.  An alphabetical suffix is added to a community number to identify revisions in the Flood Insurance Rate Map (FIRM) for that community.

iEffDate.description: The NFIP Map Panel effective date as shown on the NFIP map.

iPartCmmty.description: Indicates whether the community participates in the National Flood Insurance Program.  Y or N.

iCbraInd.description: Indicates if the building or property is located in a CBRA (C) or OPA (O).

iPrptyDesc.description: The address/description of the flood tracking record property/building.

iCmmt1.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iCmmt2.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iCmmt3.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iCmmt4.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iActualCoverage.description: The actual amount of flood insurance on the property.

iCmmt5.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iCmmt6.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iSpecialFloodArea.description: Identifies whether the special property or building is in a special flood hazard area.  Y or N.

iReqCoverage.description: The amount of flood insurance required for the loan to comply with the NFIRA - 1996.

iState.description: The two-digit abbreviation for the state in which the NFIP community is located.

iCnty.description: County in which the NFIP community is located.

iFloodZoneCde.description: Hazard Boundary Map or a Flood Insurance Rate Map that reflects the severity or type of flooding in the area.

iNbrUnits.description: Indicates how many units are contained in the building of the flood tracking record.

iFloodZoneInd.description: Indicates whether the property on the flood tracking record is in a flood zone.  Y or N.

iPanelMap.description: The National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP) map panel number is in countywide format and shows the flood hazards for the geographic areas of the county on one map, including flood hazards for incorporated communities and for any unincorporated county contained within the county's geographic limits.  Such countywide maps will list a NFIP Map Number.  For maps not in such countywide format, the NFIP will list a Community Panel Number on each panel.

iCmpyAddr.description: The street address of the flood insurance company.

iCmpyPhone.description: The phone number of the flood insurance carrier or agent.

iUsrCde1.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iUsrCde2.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iUsrCde3.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iUsrCde4.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iEscrowInd.description: Indicates whether the flood insurance premium is escrowed for by the financial institution.  Y or N.

iUsrCde5.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iUsrCde6.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

iCmpyCty.description: The city of the flood insurance company address.

iLfLoanInd.description: Indicates whether the flood hazard status will be monitored for the term of the loan.  Y or N.

iCmpyZip.description: The ZIP code of the flood insurance company address.

Zip.description: The elementized ZIP Code of the collateral address.

CityLine.description: The collateral city, state, and ZIP code information.

PrimaryInd.description: Indicates whether this collateral is the primary collateral associated with the note.  Y or N.

HouseNbr.description: The elementized house number of the collateral address.

TypCde.description: User-defined value that identifies the type of collateral.

Direction.description: The elementized direction of the collateral address.

SpecialStr.description: The elementized additional street information of the collateral address.

MSANumber.description: The MSA number of the collateral.

MaintCde.description:
Indicates the maintenance action to be taken on this collateral record.
 C  Change
 D  Delete

Desc.description: User-defined description of the collateral information in the record.

SupplmLine.description: The collateral supplemental street address information.

Percentage.description: System-calculated percentage of the dollar amount in a collateral record to the total dollar amount of all multiple collateral.

ItmLstUpdtUsrId.description: ID of the last user who updated this collateral records Consists of the first character and last 3 characters of the user ID.

CollCat.description:
The collateral category value assigned to the Multiple Collateral record.  
 AG  Agriculture  
 AS  Assignment  
 CE  Commercial Real Estate  
 EQ  Equipment  
 FI  Financial Instruments  
 MS  Miscellaneous  
 RE  Residential Real Estate
 SE  Securities  
 TR  Transportation  
 UC  UCC

ItmLstUpdtDte.description: Date a user last updated this collateral record.

Amt.description: User-defined dollar amount of the collateral for this collateral record.

Fraction.description: The elementized house number fraction of the collateral address.

City.description: The elementized city of the collateral address.

Dte.description: User-defined date of the individual collateral record.

State.description: The elementized state of the collateral address.

StreetNme.description: The elementized street name of the collateral address.

LNRTCNotcIndEntd.description: Code indicating whether you are changing the value in LN Right To Cure Notice Indicator.  Y or N.

LNBuydwnNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the buydown portion of the bill.

LNPrinPmtBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill.  For Bill Types A and C, the total payment.

LNProjectedIntDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of the interest projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the interest portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's interest payment.

LNIntBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill that has not been paid.

LNPICnstntNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, total principal and interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P, the initiating institution's P&I.

LNVltryInsNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, the voluntary insurance portion of the bill.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNRecalcReprntInd.description:
Indicates whether this bill segment has been set to reprint or recalculate in end-of-day processing.  
 Blank  Neither.
 C  Recalculate, up to the date the next bill segment is scheduled to drop.
 P  Reprint, up to and including the bill due date.

LNPdDte.description: Date the bill was paid in full.  For Bill Type A loans, the bill due date.

LNPmtFreqNew.description: Payment frequency on the payment schedule.  Required for notes with Interest Type V.

LNRTCNotcIndSent.description:
For Missouri and Kansas banks, indicates whether a Right to Cure notice has been produced for this bill.  
 Blank  A Right to Cure notice has not been produced for this bill. 
 X  Bill segment is more than ten days past due, but a Right to Cure notice will  not be created.  The maximum number of notices has been sent, or a previous bill segment with an outstanding notice exists.  
 Y  Right to Cure notice has been generated on this segment.
  The system automatically changes the indicator according to the above parameters.  If you manually change the indicator on a bill segment, you must also keyword change the following fields on the corresponding note:  LNNRTCNO, LNNRTCDT.

LNPrinPmtBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B loans, the principal portion of the bill that has not been paid.  For Bill Types A and C, the total amount that has not been paid.

LNIntBilled.description: For Bill Type B loans, the interest portion of the bill.  For Loan Category P loans, this is your institution's portion of the interest.

LNAcctNme.description: The name associated with the account.

LNEscrBilled.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill.

LNDueDteNew.description: New bill date for a single bill.

LNProjectedPrinDueNew.description: For Bill Type A loans, amount of principal projected to be due.  This field cannot be used to alter the principal portion of the payment.  For Loan Category P loans, the initiating institution's principal  payment.

LNBillDte.description: Bill due date of the bill to be maintained.

LNAchPmtInd.description:
Indicates whether an ACH or autopay transaction has been sent for processing.  
 0  ACH or autopay transaction has not been created for this bill.  
 1  ACH or autopay transaction will be created tonight.  
 2  ACH or autopay transaction has been generated.  
 9  For revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  Billed amount is eligible for small balance waiver; no autopay  transaction will be produced.

LNEscrBilledNotPd.description: For Bill Type B and C loans, the escrow portion of the bill that has not been paid.

LNInstltDisbDte.description: For each installment, indicates next expected disbursement date.  Required only if the LN Disbursement Frequency is 9 and/or the LN Even Amount Escrow Disbursement Indicator is N.  Format:  MMDD where M is month and D is date.

LNInstltDisbAmt.description: For each installment, indicates disbursement amount.

MemoAmt.description: Amount of memo accrued interest to be charged off.

TranCde.description:
Identifies the type of monetary transaction and its effects.  
 550  Financed reserves will be rebated.  For simple interest loans, original charge-off transaction; accruing reserves are terminated and financed insurance is maintained.  For add-on loans, loan balance less unearned interest is charged off; financed insurance or dealer reserves continue.  
 551  For add-on loans only, partial charge-off transaction; reserves are terminated.  
 552  For add-on loans only, partial charge-off transaction; reserves are not terminated.  
 555  For add-on loans only, complete charge-off transaction; loan balance minus current unearned interest and current reserve balances is charged off; reserves are terminated.  
 556  For simple interest loans with financed insurance only, complete charge-off transaction; financed reserves are terminated.  
 560  For simple interest and add-on loans, increases charge-off balance of partially charged-off loans

CnfmMsg2.description: After the function has completed sucessfully, the loan confirmation message will be returned.

CnfmMsg1.description: After the function has completed sucessfully, the loan confirmation message will be returned.

AccrBal.description: Accrued interest that has not been charged off.

PrinBal.description: Balance of the note that has not been charged off.

PrinAmt.description: Total amount of principal to be charged off.

AccrAmt.description: Amount of accrued interest to be charged off.

CollectStatus.description: User-defined code intended to identify the loan's potential for collection.

MemoBal.description: Memo accrued interest that has not been charged off.

CBCLInd.description: Indicates whether this commitment is for a collateral-based credit line.  Y or N.

RevAdv1Amt.description: Amount of the last revolving credit advance.

LNApplScr.description: For dealer-financed loans, the application score assigned by an external credit system.

ProdId.description: Enterprise Product assigned to this account or zeroes if none assigned.

FrclsrInd.description:
Indicates whether the note is in the foreclosure process.  
 Blank  Note is not in foreclosure.  
 A-9  User-defined code to indicate the foreclosure status.

RevAdv1Dte.description: Date of the last revolving credit advance.

ComtUsedBal.description: Total outstanding draws made against the commitment.

MERSMINNbr.description: Identifies the mortgage identification number (MIN) that has been assigned to the mortgage as part of the Mortgage Electronic Registry System (MERS).  The MIN is a unique 18-digit number used to track a mortgage loan throughout its life, from origination to payoff or foreclosure.

FrclsrDte.description: Date the note was placed in foreclosure status.  CCYY-MM-DD.

LNMinPmtAmt.description: For revolving credit (Category R) loans, the minimum payment amount to be billed.  For Payment Type P, defaults from Payment Plan Segment 420 of Bank Control.

LNRteChgFreq.description: For variable-rate loans, determines when the note interest rate changes based on changes to the related index.

TaxIdCde.description:
Identifies the type of taxpayer identification number.
 Keyword: TAXIDC
 N No number
 F Federal tax number
 S Social security number
 T Nonresident alien taxpayer identification number

IntPdYTD.description: Total of all interest paid on the note as of today for the current year.

StatCde.description: Loan status code.  Indicates whether the loan is partially or completely charged off, and whether the loan is earning interest.  May also identify the reason for nonaccrual or charge-off status.  See Loans Reference Volume 2 for a complete list of status codes.

CurBal.description: Unpaid principal balance on processing date.

TimesLate120.description: Number of times payments were late for 120 days.

TLCNoteInd.description: Indicates whether the note is part of a TLC (total line of credit) relationship.

LNNExMt.description: For variable-plan loans, or variable-rate loans using the payment/term change feature, date of expected maturity.  Used by the system to amortize the balance of the loan when changing payment amounts.  If the expected maturity date is in the past or is zeroes, the system uses the loan maturity date to amortize the balance of the loan.

IntPdToDte.description: Date to which interest is paid.

HMDAInd.description: Indicates whether a loan is included on HMDA Loan Application Register.

LstHazInsDisbAmt.description: Amount of the last hazard insurance escrow disbursement amount (Note Escrow Category HAZ or HMO).

NxtPymtChgDte.description: Next payment change date for an adjustable-rate mortgage.

CommtDrawInd.description: Determines whether a draw can be made against a commitment. For revolving credit notes with an automatic draw delinquency indicator of Y, may reset to N when a bill remains unpaid for the number of days specified in AUTO DRAW DLQ DAYS.

ComtAvailBal.description: Amount of the commitment balance currently available to the borrower.

BillLeadDays.description: Number of days before the payment due date that the bill will be produced.

CrBurStatCde.description: Code (in Metro 2 format) that specifies the current condition of the account for credit bureau reporting purposes.

LateChrgDue.description: Amount of any outstanding late charges.

ProdName.description: Enterprise Product assigned to this account or default if none assigned.

HazInsExpDte.description: Date the hazard insurance policy expires.

LNTrckCde.description: User-defined code intended to identify the note for tracking purposes.

NbrInq.description: Number of voice response inquiries made on this note this month.

LNAcctOpenDte.description: Date the loan account was opened.

LNChrgAcct.description: Identifies the DDA or savings account to which bills are charged.

OrigBal.description: Original principal balance of the loan.

RevAdv2Amt.description: Amount of the second to last revolving credit advance.

PmtChgInd.description:
Determines if and how a variable-rate note payment/term changes.  
 0  No changes.  
 1  Payment amount changes when the rate changes because of an index change.  
 2  Payment amount changes on the next rate change date after an index change, regardless of whether the rate changes.  
 3  Maturity date, term, and number of payments change when the rate changes because of an index change; payment amount remains the same.

TimesLate60.description: Number of times payments were late for 60 days.

LNRiskRtg.description: User-defined code intended to identify the level of risk associated with the loan.

LNCmmtNbr.description: Identifies the commitment associated with the loan.

Type.description: Identifies a set of note options and defaults, as defined on Bank Control Note Option Segment 410.

RevAdv2Dte.description: Date of the second to last revolving credit advance.

LstHazInsDisbDte.description: Date of the last hazard insurance escrow disbursement (Note Escrow Category HAZ or HMO).

ExtProdId.description: BI product id that corresponds to the Enterprise Product assigned to this account or blanks if none assigned.

RsrvEscrBal.description: Balance of all regular reserve escrows.

LNNmeAddrInd.description: Number from 1 through 9 identifying the name and address record.

ErrNbr.description:
VRU system error number.  Valid values are:
