StmtCpy.description: Number of statement copies to be produced.

MailCde.description:
Provides outsorting and separator page for special handling. For output types L, M, N, O, P, and Q only.
 0 Mail to customer.
 1 Requires special handling.

EffDte.description: Effective date.

DelInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates this address has been set to be deleted.

LfLoanInd.description: Indicates whether the flood hazard status will be monitored for the term of the loan.  Y or N.

CmpyPhone.description: The phone number of the flood insurance carrier or agent.

LomaInd.description: Indicates whether a LOMA or LOMR has been issued by FEMA since the current map panel effective/revised date that revises the flood hazards affecting the building.  Y or N.

SpecialFloodArea.description: Identifies whether the special property or building is in a special flood hazard area.  Y or N.

LstUpdtBy.description: The last three characters of the user ID which last updated the record.

InsExpDate.description: The expiration date of the insurance coverage.

ActualCoverage.description: The actual amount of flood insurance on the property.

PartCmmty.description: Indicates whether the community participates in the National Flood Insurance Program.  Y or N.

LstUpdtDte.description: The last date any fields on the flood record were updated.

CmmtyNbr.description: NFIP six-digit designation identifying each NFIP community.  The first two numbers are the state code.  The next four are the FIA-assigned community number.  An alphabetical suffix is added to a community number to identify revisions in the Flood Insurance Rate Map (FIRM) for that community.

CmpyZip.description: The ZIP code of the flood insurance company address.

UsrCde5.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

CmpyCty.description: The city of the flood insurance company address.

UsrCde4.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

UsrCde6.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

UsrCde1.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

PrptyNbr.description: User-defined number identifying the property used as collateral for the note.

State.description: The two-digit abbreviation for the state in which the NFIP community is located.

UsrCde3.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

UsrCde2.description: User-defined field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

CommtyNme.description: The complete name of the NFIP community in which the property/building is located.

iApprslAmt.description: The appraised value of the property/building listed on the flood tracking record.

FloodRec.description: User-defined number identifying the item associated with a specific user-defined property.

FloodZoneCde.description: Hazard Boundary Map or a Flood Insurance Rate Map that reflects the severity or type of flooding in the area.

MultLnCollInd.description: Indicates whether the property listed is used to secure multiple loans.  Y or N.

Cmmt4.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

Cmmt3.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

Cmmt2.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

Cmmt1.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

ReplaceAmt.description: Identifies the replacement cost of the property/building

Cmmt6.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

EscrowInd.description: Indicates whether the flood insurance premium is escrowed for by the financial institution.  Y or N.

Cmmt5.description: User-defined free form field allowing customer comment relative to the property/building flood information.

PanelMap.description: The National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP) map panel number is in countywide format and shows the flood hazards for the geographic areas of the county on one map, including flood hazards for incorporated communities and for any unincorporated county contained within the county's geographic limits.  Such countywide maps will list a NFIP Map Number.  For maps not in such countywide format, the NFIP will list a Community Panel Number on each panel.

EffDate.description: The NFIP Map Panel effective date as shown on the NFIP map.

CertNbr.description: The flood insurance certificate or policy number.

NbrBldgs.description: Identifies how many buildings are on the property identified in the flood tracking record.

RevisedDte.description: The NFIP Map Panel revisions date as shown on the NFIP map.

ReqCoverage.description: The amount of flood insurance required for the loan to comply with the NFIRA - 1996.

NbrUnits.description: Indicates how many units are contained in the building of the flood tracking record.

PrptyDesc.description: The address/description of the flood tracking record property/building.

LomaDate.description: The date of the LOMA or LOMR letter.

CbraInd.description: Indicates if the building or property is located in a CBRA (C) or OPA (O).

ResComInd.description:
Indicates if the property/building of the flood tracking record is residential or commercial.  
 C  Commercial.  
 R  Residential.

Cnty.description: County in which the NFIP community is located.

CmpyAgent.description: The agent of the flood insurance company.

FloodZoneInd.description: Indicates whether the property on the flood tracking record is in a flood zone.  Y or N.

DtrmDte.description: The date when the flood zone determination was processed.

CmpyAddr.description: The street address of the flood insurance company.

CmpyState.description: The state of the flood insurance company address.

MoreNotesInd.description: Indicates whether more notes are available to be retrieved.  Y or N.

SrchCat.description:
Used to filter notes according to the following values:
 
 C Commercial.
 E Student loan.
 F Floor plan.
 G General accounts receivable.
 I Installment.
 M Mortgage.
 P Purchased loan.
 R Revolving credit.
 S Specific accounts receivable.

NoteFltr.description:
Used to filter notes according to the following values:
 
 TLC for TLC notes only.
 OBP for Option-Based Pricing notes only.  
 OBP + Option ID for Option-Based Pricing notes with the specified Option ID.

RepoFeeNbr.description: Used for repeat processing when multiple requests are needed to retrieve all of the fees for the account.

ParticipantLNBal.description: Participation portion of current principal balance for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

BnkLNBal.description: Bank's share of current principal balance for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

BnkInt.description: Bank's share of accrued interest for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

RepoFeePln.description: Used for repeat processing when multiple requests are needed to retrieve all of the fees for the account.

TotFeesDue.description: Total fees due for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

TellerActy.description: For revolving credit loans, amount posted to Deposit System via On-line Dollar or Teller, but not yet posted to Loan System.  This activity is already added to the Balance field; however, it is not part of the loan history.

RepoNoteNbr.description: Used for repeat processing when multiple requests are needed to retrieve all of the notes for the account.

MoreFeesInd.description: Indicates whether more fees are available to be retrieved.  Y or N.

TotPastDue.description: Total amount past due for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

ParticipantInt.description: Participation portion of accrued interest for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

TotFeesPastDue.description: Total fees past due for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

TotPayoff.description: Total payoff for all notes meeting inquiry criteria, based on parameters set up on Bank Control Note Option Segment 410. Does not include buydown or voluntary insurance amounts.

TotBal.description: Current principal balance for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

TotInt.description: Accrued interest for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.

OldPartBal.description: Balance of the participation before the transaction.

NewAcctTotOwe.description: Bank�s share of the total owed after the transaction.

NewPartBal.description: Balance of the participation after the transaction.

EffDte.description: Effective date of the increase; it can be backdated. This is the date accruals will be affected.  Format YYYY-MM-DD.

OldAcctTotOwe.description: Bank�s share of the total owed before the transaction.

IntRte.description: Interest rate established on Bank Control Escrow Interest Plan.

IntFreq.description:
Indicates when interest is posted.  
 1  Monthly.  
 2  Quarterly.  
 3  Semiannually.  
 5  When escrows are disbursed.  
 6  Annually and when escrows are disbursed.

CalMethod.description:
Method used to calculate interest.  
 S  Simple.  
 D  Daily.  
 C  Continuous.

IntPdEOPY.description: Total interest paid end of prior year.

IntWthhldEOPY.description: Total interest withheld end of prior year.

LstIntPdDte.description: Date on which interest was last posted.

ExemptStatEOPY2.description: Exempt status end of Prior Year 2.  Same values as Exempt Status Indicator.

ExemptStatEOPY3.description: Exempt status end of Prior Year 3.  Same values as Exempt Status Indicator.

NextPayDte.description: Overrides pay date based on the Interest Frequency and First Pay Date fields on Bank Control Escrow Interest Plan 465.

BNoticeDte.description: Date B-notice is sent to the customer.

ExemptStatEOPY1.description: Exempt status end of Prior Year 1.  Same values as Exempt Status Indicator.

BasisDay.description:
Number of days in month and year used for interest calculation.  
 0  Actual day month/360-day year.  
 5  Actual day month/365-day year.

ExemptStatInd.description:
The backup withholding status of the interest-bearing escrow account.  
 0  Exempt (assumed).  
 1  Exempt (foreign account).  
 2  Exempt (corporation).  
 3  Exempt (recipient).  
 4  Exempt (confirmed).  
 5  Exempt (awaiting TIN).  
 6  Exempt (B-notice sent).  
 7  Exempt (W-9 returned certified).  
 8  Exempt (second B-notice sent).  
 9  Exempt (released from withholding through IRS). 
 A  Not exempt (IRS incorrect TIN).  
 B  Not exempt (IRS underpay).  
 C  Not exempt (no form on file).  
 D  Not exempt (bank missing ID).  
 E  Not exempt (B-notice sent).  
 F  Not exempt (account delinquent in returning W-9).  
 I  Not exempt (second B-notice sent).  
 J  Not exempt (second B-notice sent, not released from withholding through IRS).

OvrrdeInd.description: Indicates whether to override the calculated next pay date determined on Bank Control Escrow Interest Plan.

LNBatchNbr.description: User-defined number used to group multiple account payments into one total.

LNPartSpreadInd.description: Indicates whether to override the automatic participation spread field on the loan when that field is Y, indicating the system automatically distributes principal and interest portions of a payment to any associated participations. A Y in this field prevents automatic distributions.

LNBillSeq.description: Number assigned to the account bill by the system if there are multiple account bills with the same bill due date.

LNWarnMsg.description: Gives additional information about error conditions.

LNEffDte.description: Transaction effective date.  Can be backdated.

PndInd.description: For OBP payments, enter a 'P' here if you want the payment to be processed through pending.  Otherwise, this type of account-level payment will be processed immediately.

LNReleaseDte.description: Date on which the transaction will be processed. System enters the current date.

LeadCmmtAmt.description: Current balance of the lead commitment.

PrtyNbr.description: If using an ascending or descending payment method and/or funding method, identifies the order in which draws and/or payments are applied.

FundingMeth.description:
Identifies the method used to distribute a draw made against the commitment.  
 A  Ascending by priority number.  
 D  Descending by priority number.  
 P  Pro rata.

AcctNbr.description: Account number associated with lead commitment.

NbrPrtEntries.description: Indicates the number of commitment participations being added to the lead commitment.

PmtMeth.description:
Identifies the method for automatic distribution of payments to participations.  
 A  Ascending by priority number.  
 D  Descending by priority number.  
 P  Pro rata.

LNFloorPlanAcctIntRev.description: Amount of interest reversed for floor plan account.

LnFloorPlanAcctPrin.description: Amount of loan principal balance reversed for floor plan account.

LnCORecIntRev.description: Amount of charge-off recovered interest reversed.

LnNSFFeeOvrrd.description: Determines whether to override automatic fee assessment associated with Transaction Code 801.  Y or N.

LNTxnSeqNbr.description: Sequence number of transaction being reversed.

LnAcctOldTotalOwed.description: Organization�s share of the total owed on the account before the transaction.

LnRevPrin.description: Amount of loan principal balance reversed.

LnCORecPrinRev.description: Amount of charge-off recovered principal reversed.

LnCORecFeeRev.description: Amount of charge-off recovered fees reversed.

LnCurrLineOvrrd.description: Determines whether to override the OVER LIMIT COMMITMENT ALLOWED field on Processing Option Segment 400 of Bank Contol when that field is N (no), thus allowing the commitment line of credit to be exceeded.  Y or N.

LNRevLevlInd.description:
Code indicating level of transaction being reversed. 
C  Charge-off/Non-Accrual Dual Accounting 
F  Fee 
I  Floor Plan Note

LNTxnCde.description:
Indicates the type of monetary transaction.  Common reversal transactions include the following: 
 800, 803 - 806  Dollar amount posting reversal; for any reason except nonsufficient funds and fee transactions.  
 801 Payment reversal with NSF fee.  
 810  Fee reversal.

LnDefActAccrRev.description: Amount of deferred active accrual reversed.

LNTxnEffDte.description: Effective date of transaction being reversed.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

LNPndRelDte.description: Date the pending payment transaction will be processed.  If date is a nonprocessing day, transaction will post on next processing day.  For added transactions, defaults to today�s date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

LNSkipAutoInd.description: Indicates whether to prevent the automatic reversal of any system-generated transactions (including participation transactions) associated with the transaction being reversed.  Y or N.

LnBatchNbr.description: User-defined number used to group multiple reversal transactions into one total.

LnAcctNewTotalOwed.description: Organization�s share of the total owed on the account after the transaction.

LineText.description: Text for this line of the memo.

UserID.description: The name of the user who last updated the memo.

UpdateTime.description: The time on the memo update date that the memo was last updated.  Represented as HH.MM.SS.

LineNbr.description: Line number.  Line numbers must be entered in numerical order, starting at 1.

UpdateDte.description: The date the memo was last updated.  Represented as CCYY-MM-DD.

CBCLInd.description: Indicates whether this commitment is for a collateral-based credit line.  Y or N.

LNRvlvgInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment is revolving.  Y or N.

LNCollCde.description: User-defined code intended to identify the collateral securing a commitment.

LNAutoDrawDelinquencyInd.description: For revolving credit notes, determines whether the draw indicator is automatically set to N when a bill remains unpaid for the number of days specified in LN Auto Draw Delinquency Days.  May default from Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.

LNCrncyCde.description: Code identifying type of currency associated with commitment.

LNImmdPrnCmmtNbr.description: For a subcommitment, the number of the parent commitment.  For a stand-alone commitment, the number of the commitment itself.

LNPrcPlnNbr.description: Identifies the pricing plan associated with the account.

LNApprovalDte.description: Effective date of the commitment.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNOrigAmt.description: Amount for which the commitment is initially established.

LNRepayConvDte.description: Identifies the date the line of credit draw period ends for an ALC product and will be used by the system as the date event to trigger the repayment auto conversion process.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNFedCallCde.description: Identifies the loan classification for federal call report purposes, as defined on Classification Segment 415 of Bank Control.

LNDesc.description: User-entered description which overrides the commitment description set on Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.

LNCmmtRvwDte.description: Date the commitment is due for review.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNOvheadTypCde.description: User-defined code to indicate the method of calculating overhead costs during profitability analysis.  May default from Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.

LNFeePln3.description: For commitments with a fee plan default indicator of N, identifies the third of up to three fee plans associated with the commitment, as defined on Fee Plan Segment 430 of Bank Control.

LNFeePlnDfltInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment fee plan should default to the plan established for the commitment type, as defined on Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.  Y or N.

LNFeePln2.description: For commitments with a fee plan default indicator of N, identifies the second of up to three fee plans associated with the commitment, as defined on Fee Plan Segment 430 of Bank Control.

LNCmmtTypDesc.description: The commitment type and its description.

LNFeePln1.description: For commitments with a fee plan default indicator of N, identifies the first of up to three fee plans associated with the commitment, as defined on Fee Plan Segment 430 of Bank Control.

LNTerm.description: Term of the commitment expressed in months.

LNPartCde.description:
Indicates the participation status of the commitment.  
 B  Bought; commitment purchased from another financial institution.  
 N  Not a commitment participation.

LNDrawInd.description: Determines whether a draw can be made against a commitment.  For revolving credit notes with an automatic draw delinquency indicator of Y, may reset to N when a bill remains unpaid for the number of days specified in lLNAutoDrawDelinquencyDay.

LNAutoDrawDelinquencyDay.description: For revolving credit notes, the number of days after the bill due date that the draw indicator is set to N if the bill remains unpaid, preventing additional draws against the commitment.  May default from Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.

LNUsgInd.description: User-defined code to provide further identification of a commitment.

LNAdvisementLvl.description:
Indicates whether the customer is aware of the commitment and, if so, whether the commitment is an informal or legal agreement. 
 A  Advised.  Customer is aware of the agreement by way of informal verbal or written notice.  
 B - F  User-defined.  
 G  Guidance.  Commitment is established for internal purposes; customer is not aware of its existence.  
 H - K  User-defined.  
 L  Legal.  A binding legal document exists between the financial institution and the customer.  
 M - T  User-defined.  
 U  Under review.  Customer is aware of the agreement by way of informal verbal or written notice.  
 V - Z  User-defined.

LNSecuredInd.description:
Indicates whether the commitment is secured by collateral on the Collateral System.  
 B  Secured, but collateral not on Collateral System.  
 N  Not secured. 
 Y  Secured with collateral on Collateral System.

LNRepayProf.description: Identifies the repayment profile associated with this commitment, as defined on Repay Auto Conversion Segment 426 of Bank Control.   May only be entered if LN ALC Indicator field is Y (yes).

LNCmmtTyp.description: Represents a set of commitment options and defaults, as defined on Commitment Type Segment 425 of Bank Control.

LNPndInd.description: Indicates whether the commitment is pending, causing any usage to create an exception condition.

LNOrigTerm.description: Term of the commitment expressed in months.

LNBrnchNbr.description: Identifies the branch, as defined on Branch Segment 105 of Bank Control.

LNParticipatingBnkNbr.description: For commitments with a participation status indicator of B, identifies the bank involved in the participation, as indicated in the company record established on Company Basic Maintenance (LNCBM).

LNCollPct.description: Percentage of collateral required on the unused portion of the commitment.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNRdcAvail.description: Indicates whether the commitment amount immediately reduces the available balance on the parent commitment.  Reduced availability is not allowed for TLC or ultimate parent commitments.  Y or N.

LNTcklrCde.description: Identifies the tickler to be created for the commitment, as defined on Tickler Segment 130 of Bank Control.  Note:  If a code is used that is not defined on Tickler Segment 130, a default code of 998 is used and a tickler record is not created.

LNTxnCde.description: Identifies the type of transaction.

LNPCMAInd.description: Indicates whether the account is part of a Personal Cash Management relationship.  Y or N.

LNUsrCde1.description: User-defined code intended to provide additional report sorting options.

LNUsrCde4.description: User-defined code intended to provide additional report sorting options.

LNUsrCde5.description: User-defined code intended to provide additional report sorting options.

LNUsrCde2.description: User-defined code intended to provide additional report sorting options.

LNUsrCde3.description: User-defined code intended to provide additional report sorting options.

LNTakedownDte.description: For a stand-alone commitment, date the commitment should be taken down to zero if not used.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNActvStatCde.description: With the exception of the system-assigned value of P for paid, represents a user-defined code intended to indicate the status of a commitment.

LNTcklrDte.description: Date of an event or action on the commitment of which you want to be reminded.  This date must be greater than today plus the number of lead days defined on Tickler Segment 130 of Bank Control.

TLCCommitInd.description: Indicates whether commitment is part of a TLC relationship.  Y or N.

LNRiskRtg.description: User-defined code intended to identify the collection risk associated with the commitment.

LNAcctNme.description: The name associated with the account.

LNFrstFeeDueDte.description: Date the first fee payment is due.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNALCInd.description: Indicates whether this commitment is part of an account line of credit (ALC) structure.  Y or N.

LNImmdPrnAcctNbr.description: For a subcommitment, the account of the parent commitment.  For a stand-alone commitment, the account of the commitment itself.

LNExpDteInd.description:
Indicates whether the available balance that is interfaced to the general ledger is reduced to zero when the commitment expires.
 Y (Yes) - Reduce the commitment available balance that is interfaced to general ledger to zero (0.00) when the commitment expires.
 B (Both) - Reduce the commitment available and the commitment unused balances that are interfaced to general ledger to zero (0.00) when the commitment expires.
 N (Neither) - Do not reduce commitment available and commitment unused balances that are interfaced to general ledger to zero (0.00) when the commitment expires.

LNBatchNbr.description: User-defined number used to group multiple loan payments into one total.

LNMemoAccrAdj.description: Amount of adjustment to be applied to memo accrued interest.

LNDefActAcrrAdj.description: Amount of adjustment to be applied to deferred active accrued interest.

LNAcrrAdj.description: Amount of adjustment to be applied to active accrued interest.

LNChofNotePaymentAmt.description: Total amount applied as a regular payment, less any reserves or fees, and not yet applied as a nonaccrual or deferred active payment.

LNTxnCde.description: Identifies the type of monetary transaction and its effects.  Required when performing the payment (Inquiry Update Indicator = U); enter the transaction code of the regular payment.

RDChofNhstVolInsAmt.description: Amount of regular payment applied to voluntary insurance.

LNAccrPmt.description: Amount of payment to be applied to active accrued interest.

LNNewActPrin.description: Balance of the note after the payment was applied.  Data returned only after successful payment.

RDChofNhstEscrAmt.description: Amount of regular payment applied to escrow.

LNDesc.description: Description of the transaction.  May only be entered for special adjustment Tran Codes 677 or 725.

LNPrinPmt.description: Amount of payment to be applied to the principal balance.

LNChofDefrActvAccr.description: For loans in deferred active status, accrued interest accumulated since the loan was placed in deferred active status.

LNMemoAccrPymt.description: Amount of payment to be applied to memo accrued interest.

RDChofActiveAccr.description: Accrued interest that has not been placed in nonaccrual status.

LNNewMemoBalance.description: Memo accrued interest after the payment was applied.  Data returned only after successful payment.

LNDefActPmt.description: Amount of payment to be applied to deferred active accrued interest.

LNNewDefActBal.description: Deferred active accrued interest after the payment was applied.  Data returned only after successful payment.

LNNewAcrrBal.description: Active accrued interest after the payment was applied.  Data returned only after successful payment.

LNTxnCdeRegPymt.description: The transaction code used to post the regular payment.

RDChofMemoAccr.description: Accrued interest that has been placed in nonaccrual status.

TranAmt.description: Amount of accrued interest to be transferred.

TranCde.description:
Transaction code.  
 780  To change loan status to nonaccrual.  
 782  To change loan status to accrual.  
 783  To change loan status to deferred active.  
 784  To transfer memo accrued interest to active accrued interest.

MinAmt.description: For loans with sold participations, minimum amount of accrued interest that can be transferred.  This amount is the total of accrued interest on the participations.

NoteNbr.description: Loan System note number.  For Comerica implementation, the calling application (IVR) will always pass in '1' since draw activity exists under the revolving credit note.

CnfrmNme.description: After the function has completed sucessfully, the loan name will be returned.

CnfrmMsg2.description: After the function has completed sucessfully, the loan confirmation message will be returned.

CnfrmMsg1.description: After the function has completed sucessfully, the loan confirmation message will be returned.

MaxAmt.description: Maximum amount of accrued interest that can be transferred.

EffDte.description: Effective date of the transaction.

NonAccrCde.description:
For nonaccrual transactions, identifies the reason for the nonaccrual status. 
 B  Bankruptcy.  
 J  Judgment.  
 N  Nonaccrual (no reason assigned).  
 R  Repossession.

RltCustCIEnt1toEnt2RltCde.description: Code indicating relationship of the account being inquired upon to this customer, as defined on Relationship Codes Segment 605 of Bank Control.

RltCustCICurStdAddr1Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 1 of customer address record.

RltCustCICurStdNme01.description: Standardized text contained in line 1 of customer name record.

RltCustCICurStdNme02.description: Standardized text contained in line 2 of customer name record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdAddr3Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 3 of customer address record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdNme03.description: Standardized text contained in line 3 of customer name record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurMidNmeKeyFld3.description: Elementized middle name search key field.

RltCustCICurStdAddr5Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 5 of customer address record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurLstNmeKeyFld1.description: Elementized last name search key field.

RltCustCIPrmyPhNbr.description: Customer's primary phone number.  Format: AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

RltCustCtryCde.description: Country code.  Identifies the country in which the address is located, using a standard alpha-3 ISO (International Organization for Standardization) country code.

RltCustCICurStdAddr4Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 4 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.  
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdNmeCde03.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 3 of customer name record.  
 N  Name.  
 %  Legal title. 
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdNmeCde02.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 2 of customer name record.  
 N  Name.  
 %  Legal title. 
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdNmeCde01.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 1 of customer name record.  
 N  Name.  
 %  Legal title.

RltCustCICurNmePrcsTme.description: The time the customer's name/address record was last updated.

RltCustCICurFrstNmeKeyFld2.description: Elementized first name search key field.

RltCustCICurStdAddr2Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 2 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.  
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICustTaxCde.description:
Code identifying the type of taxpayer identification number.  
 F  Federal taxpayer identification number.  
 N  No taxpayer identification number.  
 S  Social security number.  
 T  Individual taxpayer identification number.

RltCustCIScndyPh.description: Customer's secondary phone number.  Format: AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

RltCustCIRltBnkNbr1.description: FIS host system bank number on which account resides.

RltCustCICurStdAddr2Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 2 of customer address record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCIEnt2toEnt1RltCde.description:
Code indicating relationship of this customer to account being inquired upon.  
 901  Primary.  
 902  Secondary.

RltCustCICurStdAddr4Txt.description: Standardized text contained in line 4 of customer address record. Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCIRltApplCde1.description: Application code identifying system.  In account profile, always 'CUST.'

RltCustCICurStdAddr1Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 1 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.

RltCustCICurStdAddr5Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 5 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.  
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCICurStdAddr3Cde.description:
Output (after standardization) of code identifying what type of information is contained in line 3 of customer address record.  
 A  Mailing information.  
 S  Street address.  
 C  City, state, ZIP code.  
 Not used in CIS Customer Profile function.

RltCustCIFaxPhNbr.description: Fax telephone number.  Format: AAANNNNNNN where A is area code and N is number.

RecalcPurge.description: When set to Y, a new purge date will be calculated using the retention months of the memo's associated category.  This flag overrides the date entered in the Purge Date field.

TrackCode.description: User-defined code that indicates the importance or status level of the memo.

Category.description: The category associated with the memo.  Must be entered if Activity Indicator = A (add).

TypeCde.description:
Indicates whether the category is predefined or user-defined.  
 S  Predefined.  
 U  User-defined.

MoreInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates there are more lines to be returned.

AcctNbr.description: Appropriate account number from the application account database.

RecordLmt.description: The number of memo lines to be returned, up to the maximum of 32.

PurgeDate.description: Date a memo will be purged by the system.  This date is system-calculated based on the retention period specified for the memo's category.  Represented as CCYY-MM-DD.

NoteNbr.description: Loan System note number.  Must be entered if the memo is related to the note.

RepoKeyLineNbr.description: For requests to retrieve additional lines, this value is required. This value will be returned to indicate the starting point of the next inquiry.

LNRsvCoPrpse.description:
Identifies the type of company with which the reserve is associated, as defined on the Company Basic Maintenance screen (LNCBM).  
 D  Dealer.  
 I  Insurance.

LNRsvPrepaidInd.description: Indicates whether the reserve was prepaid.  Y or N.

LNRsvCoCat.description: Identifies the type of dealer or insurance reserve, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

LNRsvRecourse.description: Percentage of loan balance for which the dealer is responsible if the borrower defaults.

LNRsvCoNbr.description: Identifies the company with which the reserve is associated.

LNRsvVltryInsPmtTyp.description:
Indicates how the insurance premium is calculated.  
 0  Flat amount, premium is not recalculated.  
 1  Calculated as a percentage of the principal and interest payment. 
 2  Calculated as a percentage of the sum of the escrow and principal and interest payment.  
 3  Calculated as a percentage of the sum of the principal and interest payment, escrow payment, and other voluntary insurance payments.

LNRsvCoSubcategory.description: Identifies the company subcategory with which the reserve is associated, as defined on Company Description Segment 445 of Bank Control.

LNRsvOrigAmt.description: For voluntary insurance, the monthly premium amount due.  For financed insurance reserves, the premium for the term of the loan.  For financed and prepaid dealer reserves, the amount of interest prepaid to the dealer.

LNRsvAccrRte.description: For insurance, the daily premium rate per $1,000 of the loan amount.

LNRsvMaxVltryInsPrem.description: Highest voluntary insurance premium allowed.  May default from the Company Category Maintenance screen (LNCCM).

LNRsvEarnRebateMeth.description: Determines method for earning and rebating of reserves.  Valid values:  1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, B, C, D, F, G, H, J, K, L, M, N, O, P, Q, S.  See Loans Reference Volume 2 for meanings of the values.

LNAcctLstPmtAmt.description: Amount of last posted account payment.

LNLstAdvAmt2.description: Amount of the second to last revolving credit advance.

LNAcctCurrrBal.description: Total note balance for all notes meeting inquiry criteria.  For loans with a nonaccrual or charge-off status, this reflects the actual customer balance.

LNLstAdvAmt1.description: Amount of the last revolving credit advance.

NLstAdvAmt3.description: Amount of the third to last revolving credit advance.

LNAcctNxtPymtDte.description: Due date of the earliest unpaid account bill.

LNAcctTotPayoff.description: Total payoff for all notes meeting inquiry criteria, based on parameters set up on Bank Control Note Option Segment 410. Does not include buydown or voluntary insurance amounts.

NAcctIntPdYTD.description: Total of all interest paid on the account as of today for the current year.

LNAcctNxtPymtAmt.description: Amount of the earliest unpaid account bill.

LNAcctIntPdPY.description: Total of all interest paid on the account for the previous year.

LNLstAdvDte1.description: Date of the last revolving credit advance.

LNAcctLstPmtDte.description: Effective date of last posted account payment.

LNLstAdvDte2.description: Date of the second to last revolving credit advance.

LNLstAdvDte3.description: Date of the third to last revolving credit advance.

LNAcctAvailCr.description: Unused amount of the revolving line of credit.

LNAcctDaysPstDue.description: Number of days between oldest unpaid account bill and today.

NewRteOver.description: The rate over, after this transaction.

RateUnderMargin.description: For variable split-rate loans, the numeric relation to the index.  Expressed as points or a percentage.  If less than 1%, a zero must be entered to the left of the decimal point.

Index.description: Identifies the index to which this loan is related, as defined on Index Rate Segment 125 of Bank Control.

PricePlan.description: Identifies the pricing plan associated with the account.  May default from the pricing plan on the related commitment.

NxtRteChgDte.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Identifies the date when note is eligible for the next rate change.  For all other loan types, use the appropriate keyword to change this field.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

RtePln.description: Rate plan number.  Identifies a specific rate plan record to which the note is tied, as defined on Rate Plan Segment 455 of Bank Control.  To remove a rate plan from a note, a zero must be entered.

Basis.description:
Identifies the accrual basis.  
 0  Actual-day month/360-day year.  
 3  30-day month/360-day year.  
 5  Actual-day month/365-day year.  
 7  Actual-day month/actual-day year.  
 9  30-day month/365-day year.

RteChgFreq.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Determines when the note interest rate will change based on changes made to the related index.  For all other loan types, use the appropriate keyword to change this field.

RateUnderRelInd.description: Relationship of margin under to index rate.  For variable split-rate loans, the relationship of the margin under to the index (+, - or %).

SeqNbr.description: Unique user-assigned number that differentiates this transaction from other transactions sent to pending that have the same release date.  The first transaction sent to pending can be allowed to default to blank.  However, you must assign a sequence number to any subsequent transactions with the same release date.

EffDte.description: Date the rate change is to be effective.  Defaults to today's date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

OldExcesYld.description: The excess yield, before this transaction.

RateCap.description: For Category R (revolving credit) Bill Type B loans that are tied to an index and do not have a split rate or rate plan attached to them.  Sets the amount the interest rate can move up or down per rate change.

OldRteUnder.description: The rate under, before this transaction.

NoteNbr.description: Note number.  If account-level rate change, enter zeros.

RateOverMargin.description: For floating-rate loans, the numeric relation to the index rate.  Expressed as points or a percentage.  If less than 1%, a zero must be entered to the left of the decimal point.  Also used for variable split-rate loans.

RateOverRelInd.description: Relationship of margin over to index rate.  For floating-rate loans, the relationship of the margin over to the index (+, - , or %).  Also used for variable split-rate loans.

NewRteUnder.description: The rate under, after this transaction.

SplitLimitAmt.description: Split-rate limit.  For split-rate loans, this is the division point.  Any balance over this limit accrues at the rate over; any balance under and up to this limit accrues at the rate under.

RelDte.description: Identifies the date on which the transaction should be released from the pending file.  If the release date is not entered, or if the release date entered is in the past, the system forces the effective date of the transaction to be equal to today's date.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD

RateUnder.description: For fixed split-rate loans, the rate to be charged on the portion of principal under and including the split-rate limit.

OldRteOver.description: The rate over, before this transaction.

NewExcessYld.description: The excess yield, after this transaction.

RateOver.description: For fixed-rate loans, the interest rate of the note.  For fixed split-rate loans, the rate for the balance over the split-rate limit.  For notes tied to a variable plan, the initial rate of the note represented as nnn.nnnnnn.  All nine digits need not be entered if a decimal is entered.

MoreInd.description: A 'Y' in this field indicates there are more fees to be returned.

StrtFeeNbr.description: Starting fee number.  If there are more fees to be returned, will return a value that indicates the starting point of the next inquiry.  To view the next set of fees, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

StrtPlnNbr.description: Starting plan number.  If there are more fees to be returned, will return a value that indicates the starting point of the next inquiry.  To view the next set of fees, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

RecalcPurge.description: When set to Y, a new purge date will be calculated using the retention months of the memo's associated category.  This flag overrides the date entered in the Purge Date field.

TrackCode.description: User-defined code that indicates the importance or status level of the memo.

Category.description: The category associated with the memo.  Must be entered if Activity Indicator = A (add).

Indicates whether the category is predefined or user-defined.  
 S  Predefined.  
 U  User-defined.

LNATMPtOfSaleDesc3.description: See business description for LN ATM/POS Description 1.

LNATMPtOfSaleDesc4.description: See business description for LN ATM/POS Description 1.

LNTxnCde.description:
Type of monetary transaction.  
 750  Loan increase.  
 751  Loan increase (overrides the Over Limit Commitment Allowed field on Bank Control Segment 400 for Bill Type B loans).  
 754  Loan increase resulting from an ATM transaction; revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  
 755  Loan increase sweep to cover overdraft; revolving credit (Category R) loans only.  
 759  Loan increase resulting from a POS transaction; revolving credit (Category R) loans only.

LNEffDte.description: Date accruals will be effective.  Defaults to current date if left blank.

LNAcctOldTotOwed.description: Bank's share of the total owed on the account before the transaction.

This field cannot be overridden unless the system has generated a message indicating a transaction will force the loan to exceed the bank lending limit.  Y or N.

IntRecovery.description: Amount of payment to be applied to charged-off interest.

ActiveMemoAccrIntPymt.description: Amount of payment to be applied to active memo accrued interest.

For notes tied to a variable plan, the initial rate of the note represented as nnn.nnnnnn.  All nine digits need not be entered if a decimal is entered.

SelKwd.description:
Selection criteria keyword by which to select Bill Type F floor plan loans for rate change.  
 LNNFPOPT  Floor plan option.  
 LNNFPST  Floor plan status.

MoreNotesInd.description: A �Y� in this field indicates there are more notes to be returned.

LNAcctALCInd.description: Indicates whether account is an ALC.  Y or N.

NbrNotes.description: Number of loan notes returned.  Maximum of 25.

LNRepoNoteNbr.description: Will contain a value if there are more notes to be returned.  To view the next set of notes, resubmit the inquiry using the value returned here.

LNTotLstScheduledPmtNbr.description: Payment number of last bill associated with total last schedule date.

LNIntLstBillDte.description: Due date of last interest bill associated with interest last schedule date.

LNIntNxtScheduledPmtNbr.description: Payment number for next interest bill associated with interest next schedule date.

LNTotNxtSchedDte.description: Effective date of payment schedule from which the bill is to be dropped.

LNTotIntBilledNotPd.description: Total interest amount billed.  A zero balance removes loan from past due reports.

LNTotNxtScheduledPmtNbr.description: Payment number of next bill associated with total next schedule date.

LNTotLstSchedDte.description: Effective date of payment schedule from which the bill is dropped.

LNCurIntDue.description: Current interest amount billed.  Field does not reset to zero, even when full amount paid.

LNCstCntr.description: User-defined number identifying the area responsible for income and expense generated from this account.

LNPrpseCde.description:
Indicates the type of account and corresponds to the credit bureau field 'association code' for credit bureau reporting purposes.  
 B  Business.  
 J  Joint (personal).  
 S  Single (personal).  
 1-9  Personal (user-defined).

LNANGInd.description:
Indicates if the loan account number being entered has been reserved through Loan Account Number Generator function (LNANG).  
  Y  Account number was generated.  
 N  Account number was not generated.

LNDrctAccommodationBnkNbr.description: For accommodation loans, company number (with Purpose Code P for participant) of the bank for which you made a loan.

LNFlrPlnInd.description: Indicates whether the account has associated Bill Type F floor plan loans.  Y or N.

LNANWUsrID1.description: User-defined field used to identify  accounts for reporting purposes.  Keywords sort on Account Balance Status (R-6200), Account Listing (R-6210), and Account Inquiry (R-6300) reports.

LNFICODte3.description: The date of the FICO score stored in FICO Score 3.

LNTcklrDueDte.description: Date on which some action is required on this account.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNFICODte2.description: The date of the FICO score stored in FICO Score 2.

LNFICODte1.description: The date of the FICO score stored in FICO Score 1.

LNRgn.description: User-defined code.  May be used to group branches into geographic reporting areas.

LNARApplAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of collateral value that should be applied as payment.

LNScndyOffcr.description: Identifies the secondary officer as defined on Bank Control Officer Segment 110.

LNGuarEndrsmtInd.description: Indicates whether an account is endorsed or guaranteed.  Y or N.

LNCoborrowerSSN.description: Social security number of the coborrower.

LNARGovtAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of government contracts that could be advanced.

LNAcctNbr.description: The Loan System account number to be created.

LNUccAgreeDte.description: Date UCC form filing expires.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNComb1098Ind.description:
Overrides the COMB 1098 IND field on Bank Control Processing Option Segment 400 if that field is yes (combine 1098 reporting by taxpayer ID number).  
 Blank  Use value indicated on Bank Control.  
 N  No, do not report this account on a combined 1098.

LNARGuarOrEndrNme.description: Name of person or company that guarantees or endorses the accounts receivable account.

LNFICODte4.description: The date of the FICO score stored in FICO Score 4.

LNNAICSCde.description: NAICS (North American Industrial Classification System) code.

LNUsrFlg1.description: User-defined code used to group accounts for reporting purposes.

LNAcctBillInd.description: Indicates whether the account receives account bills.  Must be Y on revolving credit loans using account- or commitment-level fees, so the fees are billed with the loan on the Revolving Credit Statement (R-6088).  Y or N.

LNARAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of receivables that could be advanced.

LNBrnchNbr.description: Identifies the branch as defined on Bank Control Branch Segment 105.

LNSrc.description: Identifies the input source of the transaction.

LNTxnCde.description: Identifies the type of transaction.

LNFsclDte.description: Date of account's fiscal year end.  Format:  MMDD where M is month and D is date.

LNARInvtyAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of inventory value that could be advanced.

LNAREquipAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of equipment value that could be advanced.

LNDtlBillInd.description:
Indicates whether the account or note bill shows detailed history since the last bill was created.  
 D  Account or note receives detailed bills showing all history.  
 N  No, account or note receives summary bills showing only total amounts due.

LNARChattAdvancePct.description: For accounts receivable account, indicates percentage of chattel paper that could be advanced.

LNFinStmtDueDte.description: Date the next account financial statement is due.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.

LNAcctPayProf.description: Indentifies the payment application sequence order for all loans included in an ALC structure.

LNAcctNme.description: Identifies the owner of the account on inquiries and reports.  Tip:  Because many reports sort alphabetically by the account name, we suggest putting the last name first.  If you are setting up a joint account, the name can include both first names  (e.g., Smith, John & Mary).

LNAcctTyp.description: Identifies a set of account characteristics, as defined on Bank Control Account Option Segment 405.

LNZIP.description: Account ZIP code.  Used for report sorting, such as by interest paid year to date.

LNRiskRte.description: User-defined risk rating for the account.

LNOrgTyp.description: Code that identifies accounts owned by special groups of customers.  Can be used to limit information that appears on the Paid Loan List (R-6030).  Accounts coded with a first character of O, D, or E appear on the Edit List  (R-6020), New Loan (R-6040), and Renewed Loan (R-6041) reports without names to protect employees' privacy.  Note:  This code can function as two separate one-character codes or as a combined two-character code.  See Loans Reference Volume 2 for a  list of codes.

LNFICOScore1.description: A predictive credit score. The FICO score was developed by FICO, formerly Fair Isaac, and is used for 'predictive analytics'.

LNFICOScore2.description: A predictive credit score. The FICO score was developed by FICO, formerly Fair Isaac, and is used for 'predictive analytics'.

LNActvDutyStrtDte.description: Start date of military service.  Format:  CCYY-MM-DD where C is century, Y is year, M is month, and D is date.
